23712 | // src/devkit/registry/BundleRegistry.sol
23713 | 
23714 | /**---------------------
23715 |     Support Methods
23716 | -----------------------*/
23717 | 
23718 | // Validation
23719 | 
23720 | // Context
23721 | 
23722 | // Core Type
23723 | 
23724 | //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23725 | //  📙 Bundle Registry    ////////////////////////////////
23726 |     using BundleRegistryLib for BundleRegistry global;
23727 |     using Tracer for BundleRegistry global;
23728 |     using Inspector for BundleRegistry global;
23729 | //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23730 | struct BundleRegistry {
23731 |     mapping(string name => Bundle) bundles;
23732 |     Current current;
23733 | }
23734 | library BundleRegistryLib {
23735 |     using Tracer for string;
23736 |     using NameGenerator for mapping(string => Bundle);
23737 | 
23738 |     /**---------------------
23739 |         🌱 Init Bundle
23740 |     -----------------------*/
23741 |     function init(BundleRegistry storage registry, string memory name) internal returns(BundleRegistry storage) {
23742 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("init", param_27(name));
23743 |         Validator.MUST_NotEmptyName(name);
23744 |         Bundle storage bundle = registry.bundles[name];
23745 |         Validator.MUST_NotInitialized(bundle);
23746 |         bundle.assignName(name);
23747 |         registry.current.update(name);
23748 |         return registry.finishProcess(pid);
23749 |     }
23750 |     function ensureInit(BundleRegistry storage registry) internal returns(BundleRegistry storage) {
23751 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("ensureInit");
23752 |         Validator.SHOULD_ExistCurrentBundle(registry) ? registry : registry.init(registry.genUniqueName());
23753 |         return registry.finishProcess(pid);
23754 |     }
23755 | 
23756 |     /**--------------------
23757 |         🔍 Find Bundle
23758 |     ----------------------*/
23759 |     function find(BundleRegistry storage registry, string memory name) internal returns(Bundle storage bundle) {
23760 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("find", param_27(name));
23761 |         Validator.MUST_NotEmptyName(name);
23762 |         bundle = registry.bundles[name];
23763 |         Validator.SHOULD_Completed(bundle);
23764 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23765 |     }
23766 |     function findCurrent(BundleRegistry storage registry) internal returns(Bundle storage bundle) {
23767 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("findCurrent");
23768 |         Validator.MUST_ExistCurrentName(registry);
23769 |         bundle = registry.find(registry.current.name);
23770 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23771 |     }
23772 | 
23773 |     /**-----------------------------
23774 |         🏷 Generate Unique Name
23775 |     -------------------------------*/
23776 |     function genUniqueName(BundleRegistry storage registry) internal returns(string memory name) {
23777 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("genUniqueName");
23778 |         name = registry.bundles.genUniqueName();
23779 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23780 |     }
23781 | 
23782 | }
23783 | 
23784 | // src/devkit/registry/DictionaryRegistry.sol
23785 | 
23786 | /**---------------------
23787 |     Support Methods
23788 | -----------------------*/
23789 | 
23790 | // Validation
23791 | 
23792 | // Context
23793 | 
23794 | // Core Type
23795 | 
23796 | //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23797 | //  📘 Dictionary Registry    ////////////////////////////////////
23798 |     using DictionaryRegistryLib for DictionaryRegistry global;
23799 |     using Tracer for DictionaryRegistry global;
23800 |     using Inspector for DictionaryRegistry global;
23801 | //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23802 | struct DictionaryRegistry {
23803 |     mapping(string name => Dictionary_1) dictionaries;
23804 |     Current current;
23805 | }
23806 | library DictionaryRegistryLib {
23807 |     using NameGenerator for mapping(string => Dictionary_1);
23808 | 
23809 |     /**---------------------------
23810 |         🗳️ Register Dictionary
23811 |     -----------------------------*/
23812 |     function register(DictionaryRegistry storage registry, Dictionary_1 memory _dictionary) internal returns(Dictionary_1 storage dictionary) {
23813 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("register", param_11(_dictionary));
23814 |         Validator.MUST_Completed(_dictionary);
23815 |         string memory uniqueName = registry.genUniqueName(_dictionary.name);
23816 |         _dictionary.assignName(uniqueName);
23817 |         dictionary = registry.dictionaries[uniqueName] = _dictionary;
23818 |         registry.current.update(uniqueName);
23819 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23820 |     }
23821 | 
23822 |     /**------------------------
23823 |         🔍 Find Dictionary
23824 |     --------------------------*/
23825 |     function find(DictionaryRegistry storage registry, string memory name) internal returns(Dictionary_1 storage dictionary) {
23826 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("find", param_27(name));
23827 |         Validator.MUST_NotEmptyName(name);
23828 |         Validator.MUST_Registered(registry, name);
23829 |         dictionary = registry.dictionaries[name];
23830 |         Validator.MUST_Completed(dictionary);
23831 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23832 |     }
23833 |     function findCurrent(DictionaryRegistry storage registry) internal returns(Dictionary_1 storage dictionary) {
23834 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("findCurrent");
23835 |         Validator.MUST_ExistCurrentName(registry);
23836 |         dictionary = registry.find(registry.current.name);
23837 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23838 |     }
23839 | 
23840 |     /**-----------------------------
23841 |         🏷 Generate Unique Name
23842 |     -------------------------------*/
23843 |     function genUniqueName(DictionaryRegistry storage registry, string memory baseName) internal returns(string memory name) {
23844 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("genUniqueName", param_27(baseName));
23845 |         name = registry.dictionaries.genUniqueName(baseName);
23846 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23847 |     }
23848 |     function genUniqueMockName(DictionaryRegistry storage registry, string memory baseName) internal returns(string memory name) {
23849 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("genUniqueMockName");
23850 |         name = registry.dictionaries.genUniqueMockName(baseName);
23851 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23852 |     }
23853 | 
23854 | }

23856 | // src/devkit/registry/FunctionRegistry.sol
23857 | 
23858 | /**---------------------
23859 |     Support Methods
23860 | -----------------------*/
23861 | 
23862 | // Validation
23863 | 
23864 | // Context
23865 | 
23866 | // Core Type
23867 | 
23868 | //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23869 | //  📗 Functions Registry    /////////////////////////////////
23870 |     using FunctionRegistryLib for FunctionRegistry global;
23871 |     using Tracer for FunctionRegistry global;
23872 | //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23873 | struct FunctionRegistry {
23874 |     mapping(string name => Function) functions;
23875 |     Current current;
23876 | }
23877 | library FunctionRegistryLib {
23878 | 
23879 |     /**--------------------------
23880 |         🗳️ Register Function
23881 |     ----------------------------*/
23882 |     function register(FunctionRegistry storage registry, string memory name, bytes4 selector, address implementation) internal returns(FunctionRegistry storage) {
23883 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("register");
23884 |         Validator.MUST_NotEmptyName(name);
23885 |         registry.functions[name].assign(name, selector, implementation);
23886 |         registry.current.update(name);
23887 |         return registry.finishProcess(pid);
23888 |     }
23889 | 
23890 |     /**----------------------
23891 |         🔍 Find Function
23892 |     ------------------------*/
23893 |     function find(FunctionRegistry storage registry, string memory name) internal returns(Function storage func) {
23894 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("find");
23895 |         Validator.MUST_NotEmptyName(name);
23896 |         Validator.MUST_Registered(registry, name);
23897 |         func = registry.functions[name];
23898 |         Validator.MUST_Completed(func);
23899 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23900 |     }
23901 |     function findCurrent(FunctionRegistry storage registry) internal returns(Function storage func) {
23902 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("findCurrent");
23903 |         string memory name = registry.current.name;
23904 |         Validator.MUST_NotEmptyName(name);
23905 |         func = registry.find(name);
23906 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23907 |     }
23908 | 
23909 | }
23910 | 
23911 | // src/devkit/registry/ProxyRegistry.sol
23912 | 
23913 | /**---------------------
23914 |     Support Methods
23915 | -----------------------*/
23916 | 
23917 | // Validation
23918 | 
23919 | // Context
23920 | 
23921 | // Core Type
23922 | 
23923 | ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23924 | //  📕 Proxy Registry    ///////////////////////////////
23925 |     using ProxyRegistryLib for ProxyRegistry global;
23926 |     using Tracer for ProxyRegistry global;
23927 |     using Inspector for ProxyRegistry global;
23928 | ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23929 | struct ProxyRegistry {
23930 |     mapping(string name => Proxy_2) proxies;
23931 |     Current current;
23932 | }
23933 | library ProxyRegistryLib {
23934 |     using NameGenerator for mapping(string => Proxy_2);
23935 | 
23936 |     /**-----------------------
23937 |         🗳️ Register Proxy
23938 |     -------------------------*/
23939 |     function register(ProxyRegistry storage registry, string memory name, Proxy_2 memory _proxy) internal returns(Proxy_2 storage proxy) {
23940 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("register", param_21(name, _proxy));
23941 |         Validator.MUST_NotEmptyName(name);
23942 |         Validator.MUST_Completed(_proxy);
23943 |         Validator.MUST_NotRegistered(registry, name);
23944 |         proxy = registry.proxies[name] = _proxy;
23945 |         registry.current.update(name);
23946 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23947 |     }
23948 | 
23949 |     /**-------------------
23950 |         🔍 Find Proxy
23951 |     ---------------------*/
23952 |     function find(ProxyRegistry storage registry, string memory name) internal returns(Proxy_2 storage proxy) {
23953 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("find", param_27(name));
23954 |         Validator.MUST_NotEmptyName(name);
23955 |         proxy = registry.proxies[name];
23956 |         Validator.MUST_Completed(proxy);
23957 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23958 |     }
23959 |     function findCurrent(ProxyRegistry storage registry) internal returns(Proxy_2 storage proxy) {
23960 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("findCurrent");
23961 |         Validator.MUST_ExistCurrentName(registry);
23962 |         proxy = registry.find(registry.current.name);
23963 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23964 |     }
23965 | 
23966 |     /**-----------------------------
23967 |         🏷 Generate Unique Name
23968 |     -------------------------------*/
23969 |     function genUniqueName(ProxyRegistry storage registry) internal returns(string memory name) {
23970 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("genUniqueName");
23971 |         name = registry.proxies.genUniqueName();
23972 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23973 |     }
23974 |     function genUniqueMockName(ProxyRegistry storage registry, string memory baseName) internal returns(string memory name) {
23975 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("genUniqueMockName");
23976 |         name = registry.proxies.genUniqueMockName(baseName);
23977 |         registry.finishProcess(pid);
23978 |     }
23979 | 
23980 | }

23982 | // src/devkit/registry/StdFunctions.sol
23983 | 
23984 | /**---------------------
23985 |     Support Methods
23986 | -----------------------*/
23987 | 
23988 | // Validation
23989 | 
23990 | // Core Types
23991 | 
23992 | // MC Std
23993 | 
23994 | //////////////////////////////////////////////////////
23995 | //  🏰 Standard Functions    /////////////////////////
23996 |     using StdFunctionsLib for StdFunctions global;
23997 |     using Tracer for StdFunctions global;
23998 |     using TypeGuard for StdFunctions global;
23999 | //////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24000 | struct StdFunctions {
24001 |     Function initSetAdmin;
24002 |     Function getFunctions;
24003 |     Function clone;
24004 |     TypeStatus status;
24005 | }
24006 | library StdFunctionsLib {
24007 |     /**~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
24008 |         🟢 Complete Standard Functions
24009 |         📨 Fetch Standard Functions from Env
24010 |         🚀 Deploy Standard Functions If Not Exists
24011 |     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
24012 | 
24013 |     /**------------------------------------
24014 |         🟢 Complete Standard Functions
24015 |     --------------------------------------*/
24016 |     function complete(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
24017 |         uint pid = std.startProcess("complete");
24018 |         std.fetch();
24019 |         std.deployIfNotExists();
24020 |         std.lock();
24021 |         return std.finishProcess(pid);
24022 |     }
24023 | 
24024 |     /**-----------------------------------------
24025 |         📨 Fetch Standard Functions from Env
24026 |     -------------------------------------------*/
24027 |     function fetch(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
24028 |         uint pid = std.startProcess("fetch");
24029 |         std.startBuilding();
24030 |         std .fetch_InitSetAdmin()
24031 |             .fetch_GetFunctions()
24032 |             .fetch_Clone();
24033 |         std.finishBuilding();
24034 |         return std.finishProcess(pid);
24035 |     }
24036 | 
24037 |         /**===== Each Std Function =====*/
24038 |         function fetch_InitSetAdmin(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
24039 |             uint pid = std.startProcess("fetch_InitSetAdmin");
24040 |             std.initSetAdmin.fetch("InitSetAdmin")
24041 |                             .assignSelector(InitSetAdmin.initSetAdmin.selector);
24042 |             Logger.logDebug(std.initSetAdmin.toString());
24043 |             return std.finishProcess(pid);
24044 |         }
24045 | 
24046 |         function fetch_GetFunctions(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
24047 |             uint pid = std.startProcess("fetch_GetFunctions");
24048 |             std.getFunctions .fetch("GetFunctions")
24049 |                         .assignSelector(GetFunctions.getFunctions.selector);
24050 |             Logger.logDebug(std.getFunctions.toString());
24051 |             return std.finishProcess(pid);
24052 |         }
24053 | 
24054 |         function fetch_Clone(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
24055 |             uint pid = std.startProcess("fetch_Clone");
24056 |             std.clone   .fetch("Clone")
24057 |                         .assignSelector(Clone.clone.selector);
24058 |             Logger.logDebug(std.clone.toString());
24059 |             return std.finishProcess(pid);
24060 |         }
24061 | 
24062 |     /**-----------------------------------------------
24063 |         🚀 Deploy Standard Functions If Not Exists
24064 |         TODO versioning
24065 |     -------------------------------------------------*/
24066 |     function deployIfNotExists(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
24067 |         uint pid = std.startProcess("deployIfNotExists");
24068 |         std.startBuilding();
24069 |         std .deployIfNotExists_InitSetAdmin()
24070 |             .deployIfNotExists_GetFunctions()
24071 |             .deployIfNotExists_Clone();
24072 |         std.finishBuilding();
24073 |         return std.finishProcess(pid);
24074 |     }
24075 |         /**===== Each Std Function =====*/
24076 |         function deployIfNotExists_InitSetAdmin(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
24077 |             uint pid = std.startProcess("deployIfNotExists_InitSetAdmin");
24078 |             if (std.initSetAdmin.hasNotContract()) {
24079 |                 std.initSetAdmin.assignImplementation(address(new InitSetAdmin()));
24080 |             }
24081 |             return std.finishProcess(pid);
24082 |         }
24083 | 
24084 |         function deployIfNotExists_GetFunctions(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
24085 |             uint pid = std.startProcess("deployIfNotExists_GetFunctions");
24086 |             if (std.getFunctions.hasNotContract()) {
24087 |                 std.getFunctions.assignImplementation(address(new GetFunctions()));
24088 |             }
24089 |             return std.finishProcess(pid);
24090 |         }
24091 | 
24092 |         function deployIfNotExists_Clone(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
24093 |             uint pid = std.startProcess("deployIfNotExists_Clone");
24094 |             if (std.clone.hasNotContract()) {
24095 |                 std.clone.assignImplementation(address(new Clone()));
24096 |             }
24097 |             return std.finishProcess(pid);
24098 |         }
24099 | 
24100 | }
24101 |

24103 | 
24104 | /**---------------------
24105 |     Support Methods
24106 | -----------------------*/
24107 | 
24108 | // Validation
24109 | 
24110 | // Core Types
24111 | 
24112 | // MC Std
24113 | 
24114 | ////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24115 | //  🏛 Standard Registry    ////////////////////////
24116 |     using StdRegistryLib for StdRegistry global;
24117 |     using Tracer for StdRegistry global;
24118 |     using TypeGuard for StdRegistry global;
24119 | ////////////////////////////////////////////////////
24120 | struct StdRegistry {
24121 |     StdFunctions functions;
24122 |     Bundle all;
24123 |     TypeStatus status;
24124 | }
24125 | library StdRegistryLib {
24126 | 
24127 |     /**----------------------------------
24128 |         🟢 Complete Standard Registry
24129 |     ------------------------------------*/
24130 |     function complete(StdRegistry storage registry) internal returns(StdRegistry storage) {
24131 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("complete");
24132 |         registry.functions.complete();
24133 |         registry.configureStdBundle();
24134 |         registry.lock();
24135 |         return registry.finishProcess(pid);
24136 |     }
24137 | 
24138 |     /**----------------------------------
24139 |         🔧 Configure Standard Bundles
24140 |     ------------------------------------*/
24141 |     function configureStdBundle(StdRegistry storage registry) internal returns(StdRegistry storage) {
24142 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("configureStdBundle");
24143 |         registry.startBuilding();
24144 |         registry.configureStdBundle_All();
24145 |         registry.finishBuilding();
24146 |         return registry.finishProcess(pid);
24147 |     }
24148 |         /**===== Each Std Bundle =====*/
24149 |         function configureStdBundle_All(StdRegistry storage registry) internal returns(StdRegistry storage) {
24150 |             uint pid = registry.startProcess("configureStdBundle_All");
24151 |             registry.all.assignName("ALL_STD_FUNCTIONS")
24152 |                         .pushFunction(registry.functions.initSetAdmin)
24153 |                         .pushFunction(registry.functions.getFunctions)
24154 |                         .pushFunction(registry.functions.clone)
24155 |                         .assignFacade(address(new StdFacade()));
24156 |             return registry.finishProcess(pid);
24157 |         }
24158 | 
24159 | }
24160 | 
24161 | /****************************************************
24162 |     🧩 Std Ops Primitive Utils for Arguments
24163 | *****************************************************/
24164 | library StdFunctionsArgs {
24165 |     function initSetAdminBytes(address admin) internal pure returns(bytes memory) {
24166 |         return abi.encodeCall(InitSetAdmin.initSetAdmin, admin);
24167 |     }
24168 | 
24169 | }

24179 | ////////////////////////////////////////////

24181 |     using CurrentLib for Current global;
24182 |     using Tracer for Current global;
24183 | ////////////////////////////////////////////
24184 | struct Current {
24185 |     string name;
24186 | }
24187 | library CurrentLib {
24188 | 
24189 |     /**-------------------------------
24190 |         🔄 Update Current Context
24191 |     ---------------------------------*/
24192 |     function update(Current storage current, string memory name) internal {
24193 |         uint pid = current.startProcess("update", param_27(name));
24194 |         Validator.MUST_NotEmptyName(name);
24195 |         current.name = name;
24196 |         current.finishProcess(pid);
24197 |     }
24198 | 
24199 |     /**------------------------------
24200 |         🧹 Reset Current Context
24201 |     --------------------------------*/
24202 |     function reset(Current storage current) internal {
24203 |         uint pid = current.startProcess("reset");
24204 |         delete current.name;
24205 |         current.finishProcess(pid);
24206 |     }
24207 | 
24208 |     /**------------------
24209 |         🔍 Find Name
24210 |     --------------------*/
24211 |     function find(Current storage current) internal returns(string memory name) {
24212 |         uint pid = current.startProcess("find");
24213 |         Validator.MUST_NameFound(current);
24214 |         name = current.name;
24215 |         current.finishProcess(pid);
24216 |     }

24220 | // src/devkit/system/Config.sol
24221 | 
24222 |     using ForgeHelper for string;
24223 | 
24224 |     using Parser for string;
24225 | 
24226 | /**----------------------
24227 |     📝 Config
24228 | ------------------------*/
24229 | using ConfigLib for ConfigState global;
24230 | 
24231 | /**===============\
24232 | |   📝 Config     |
24233 | \================*/
24234 | /// @custom:storage-location erc7201:mc.devkit.config
24235 | struct ConfigState {
24236 |     SetupConfig SETUP;
24237 |     SystemConfig SYSTEM;
24238 |     NamingConfig DEFAULT_NAME;
24239 | }
24240 |     struct SetupConfig {
24241 |         bool STD_FUNCS;
24242 |     }
24243 |     struct SystemConfig {
24244 |         Logger.Level LOG_LEVEL;
24245 |         uint SCAN_RANGE;
24246 |     }
24247 |     struct NamingConfig {
24248 |         string DICTIONARY;
24249 |         string DICTIONARY_DUPLICATED;
24250 |         string DICTIONARY_MOCK;
24251 |         string PROXY;
24252 |         string PROXY_MOCK;
24253 |         string BUNDLE;
24254 |         string FUNCTION;
24255 |     }
24256 | 
24257 | library ConfigLib {
24258 |     function load(ConfigState storage config) internal {
24259 |         loadFromLibMC(config);
24260 |         loadFromProjectRoot(config);
24261 |     }
24262 | 
24263 |     function loadFromLibMC(ConfigState storage config) internal {
24264 |         string memory path = string.concat(vm.projectRoot(), "/lib/mc/mc.toml");
24265 |         if (Validator.SHOULD_FileExists(path)) config.loadFrom(path);
24266 |     }
24267 |     function loadFromProjectRoot(ConfigState storage config) internal {
24268 |         string memory path = string.concat(vm.projectRoot(), "/mc.toml");
24269 |         if (Validator.SHOULD_FileExists(path)) config.loadFrom(path);
24270 |     }
24271 | 
24272 |     function loadFrom(ConfigState storage config, string memory path) internal {
24273 |         string memory toml = vm.readFile(path);
24274 |         // Setup
24275 |         config.SETUP.STD_FUNCS = toml.readBoolOr(".setup.STD_FUNCS", config.SETUP.STD_FUNCS);
24276 |         // System
24277 |         config.SYSTEM.LOG_LEVEL = toml.readLogLevelOr(".system.LOG_LEVEL", config.SYSTEM.LOG_LEVEL);
24278 |         config.SYSTEM.SCAN_RANGE = toml.readUintOr(".system.SCAN_RANGE", config.SYSTEM.SCAN_RANGE);
24279 |         // Naming
24280 |         config.DEFAULT_NAME.DICTIONARY = toml.readStringOr(".naming.DEFAULT_DICTIONARY", "config.DEFAULT_NAME.DICTIONARY");
24281 |         config.DEFAULT_NAME.DICTIONARY_DUPLICATED = toml.readStringOr(".naming.DEFAULT_DICTIONARY_DUPLICATED", "config.DEFAULT_NAME.DICTIONARY_DUPLICATED");
24282 |         config.DEFAULT_NAME.DICTIONARY_MOCK = toml.readStringOr(".naming.DEFAULT_DICTIONARY_MOCK", "config.DEFAULT_NAME.DICTIONARY_MOCK");
24283 |         config.DEFAULT_NAME.PROXY = toml.readStringOr(".naming.DEFAULT_PROXY", "config.DEFAULT_NAME.PROXY");
24284 |         config.DEFAULT_NAME.PROXY_MOCK = toml.readStringOr(".naming.DEFAULT_PROXY_MOCK", "config.DEFAULT_NAME.PROXY_MOCK");
24285 |         config.DEFAULT_NAME.BUNDLE = toml.readStringOr(".naming.DEFAULT_BUNDLE", "config.DEFAULT_NAME.BUNDLE");
24286 |         config.DEFAULT_NAME.FUNCTION = toml.readStringOr(".naming.DEFAULT_FUNCTION", "config.DEFAULT_NAME.FUNCTION");
24287 |     }
24288 | 
24289 | }
24290 | 
24291 | // src/devkit/system/Logger.sol
24292 | 
24293 | // Forge-std
24294 | 
24295 | // System
24296 | 
24297 | /**===============
24298 |     📊 Logger
24299 | =================*/
24300 | library Logger {
24301 | 
24302 |     enum Level {
24303 |         Critical,   // Display critical error messages only
24304 |         Error,      // Display error messages only
24305 |         Warn,       // Display warning and error messages
24306 |         Info,       // Display info, warning, and error messages
24307 |         Debug       // Display all messages including debug details
24308 |     }
24309 | 
24310 |     // Message Header
24311 |     string constant CRITICAL = "\u001b[91m[\xF0\x9F\x9A\xA8CRITICAL]\u001b[0m";
24312 |     string constant ERROR = "\u001b[91m[\u2716 ERROR]\u001b[0m\n\t";
24313 |     string constant WARN = "\u001b[93m[WARNING]\u001b[0m";
24314 |     string constant INFO = "\u001b[92m[INFO]\u001b[0m";
24315 |     string constant DEBUG = "\u001b[94m[DEBUG]\u001b[0m";
24316 | 
24317 |     /**------------------
24318 |         💬 Logging
24319 |     --------------------*/
24320 |     function log(string memory message) internal pure {
24321 |         console.log(message);
24322 |     }
24323 |     function log(string memory header, string memory message) internal pure {
24324 |         console.log(header, message);
24325 |     }
24326 | 
24327 |     function logException(string memory messageHead, string memory messageBody) internal view {
24328 |         if (currentLevel() == Level.Critical) logCritical(messageHead);
24329 |         if (currentLevel() >= Level.Error) logError(Formatter.toMessage(messageHead, messageBody));
24330 |     }
24331 |     function logCritical(string memory messageHead) internal pure {
24332 |         log(CRITICAL, messageHead);
24333 |     }
24334 |     function logError(string memory message) internal view {
24335 |         log(ERROR, message);
24336 |         log(Tracer.traceErrorLocations());
24337 |     }
24338 |     function logWarn(string memory message) internal view {
24339 |         if (shouldLog(Level.Warn)) log(WARN, message);
24340 |     }
24341 |     function logInfo(string memory message) internal view {
24342 |         if (shouldLog(Level.Info)) log(INFO, message);
24343 |     }
24344 |     function logDebug(string memory message) internal view {
24345 |         if (shouldLog(Level.Debug)) log(DEBUG, message);
24346 |     }
24347 | 
24348 |     /**-------------------
24349 |         💾 Export Log
24350 |     ---------------------*/
24351 |     function exportTo(string memory fileName) internal {}
24352 | 
24353 |     // Check Current Log Level
24354 |     function currentLevel() internal view returns(Level) {
24355 |         return System.Config().SYSTEM.LOG_LEVEL;
24356 |     }
24357 | 
24358 |     function shouldLog(Level level) internal view returns(bool) {
24359 |         Level _currentLevel = currentLevel();
24360 |         return level <= _currentLevel;
24361 |     }
24362 | 
24363 |     function isDisable() internal view returns(bool) {
24364 |         return currentLevel() == Level.Critical;
24365 |     }
24366 | 
24367 | }
24368 | 
24369 | // src/devkit/system/System.sol
24370 | 
24371 | /**===============\
24372 | |   💻 System     |
24373 | \================*/
24374 | library System {
24375 |     function Config() internal pure returns(ConfigState storage ref) {
24376 |         assembly { ref.slot := 0x43faf0b0e69b78a7870a9a7da6e0bf9d6f14028444e1b48699a33401cb840400 }
24377 |     }
24378 |     function Tracer() internal pure returns(Trace storage ref) {
24379 |         assembly { ref.slot := 0xa49160886909e5e0f01c27589d50ba63eab65b778730b187d2804aa2e50cc900 }
24380 |     }
24381 | 
24382 |     function Exit(string memory errorHead, string memory errorDetail) internal view {
24383 |         Logger.logException(errorHead, errorDetail);
24384 |         revert(errorHead);
24385 |     }
24386 | 
24387 | }
24388 | 
24389 | // src/devkit/system/Tracer.sol
24390 | 
24391 | // System
24392 | 
24393 | // Types
24394 | 
24395 |     using Inspector for bool;
24396 | 
24397 |     using Formatter for Process global;
24398 |     using Formatter for bytes4;
24399 |     using Formatter for address;
24400 |     using Formatter for string;
24401 | // Core Types
24402 | 
24403 | /**=================
24404 |     ⛓️ Process
24405 | ===================*/
24406 | /// @custom:storage-location erc7201:mc.devkit.tracer
24407 | struct Trace {
24408 |     Process[] processStack;
24409 |     uint nextPid;
24410 |     uint currentNest;
24411 | }
24412 | struct Process {
24413 |     string libName;
24414 |     string funcName;
24415 |     string params;
24416 |     uint nest;
24417 |     bool isFinished;
24418 | }
24419 | library Tracer {
24420 |     /**----------------------------
24421 |         📈 Execution Tracking
24422 |     ------------------------------*/
24423 |     function start(string memory libName, string memory funcName, string memory params) internal returns(uint pid) {
24424 |         if (Logger.isDisable()) return 0;
24425 |         Trace storage trace = System.Tracer();
24426 |         pid = trace.nextPid;
24427 |         Process memory process = Process(libName, funcName, params, trace.currentNest, false);
24428 |         trace.processStack.push(process);
24429 |         trace.currentNest++;
24430 |         Logger.logInfo(process.toStart(pid));
24431 |         trace.nextPid++;
24432 |     }
24433 | 
24434 |     function finish(uint pid) internal {
24435 |         if (Logger.isDisable()) return;
24436 |         Trace storage trace = System.Tracer();
24437 |         Process storage process = trace.processStack[pid];
24438 |         process.isFinished = true;
24439 |         Logger.logInfo(process.toFinish(pid));
24440 |         trace.currentNest--;
24441 |     }
24442 | 
24443 |     function traceErrorLocations() internal view returns(string memory locations) {
24444 |         Process[] memory processStack = System.Tracer().processStack;
24445 |         for (uint i = processStack.length; i > 0; --i) {
24446 |             Process memory process = processStack[i-1];
24447 |             if (process.isFinished) continue;
24448 |             locations = locations.append(process.toLocation());
24449 |         }
24450 |     }
24451 | 
24452 |     /**-----------
24453 |         🌞 mc
24454 |     -------------*/
24455 |     function startProcess(MCDevKit storage, string memory name, string memory params) internal returns(uint) {
24456 |         return start("mc", name, params);
24457 |     }
24458 |     function startProcess(MCDevKit storage mc, string memory name) internal returns(uint) {
24459 |         return startProcess(mc, name, "");
24460 |     }
24461 |     function finishProcess(MCDevKit storage mc, uint pid) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
24462 |         finish(pid);
24463 |         return mc;
24464 |     }
24465 | 
24466 |     // String
24467 |     function finishProcess(string memory str, uint pid) internal returns(string memory) {
24468 |         finish(pid);
24469 |         return str;
24470 |     }
24471 | 
24472 |     /**------------------
24473 |         🧩 Function
24474 |     --------------------*/
24475 |     function startProcess(Function storage, string memory name, string memory params) internal returns(uint) {
24476 |         return start("Function", name, params);
24477 |     }
24478 |     function startProcess(Function storage func, string memory name) internal returns(uint) {
24479 |         return startProcess(func, name, "");
24480 |     }
24481 |     function finishProcess(Function storage func, uint pid) internal returns(Function storage) {
24482 |         finish(pid);
24483 |         return func;
24484 |     }
24485 | 
24486 |     /**--------------------------
24487 |         🧩 Functions Registry
24488 |     ----------------------------*/
24489 |     function startProcess(FunctionRegistry storage, string memory name, string memory params) internal returns(uint) {
24490 |         return start("FunctionRegistry", name, params);
24491 |     }
24492 |     function startProcess(FunctionRegistry storage functions, string memory name) internal returns(uint) {
24493 |         return functions.startProcess(name, "");
24494 |     }
24495 | 
24496 |     function finishProcess(FunctionRegistry storage functions, uint pid) internal returns(FunctionRegistry storage) {
24497 |         finish(pid);
24498 |         return functions;
24499 |     }
24500 | 
24501 |     /**----------------
24502 |         🗂️ Bundle
24503 |     ------------------*/
24504 |     function startProcess(Bundle storage, string memory name, string memory params) internal returns(uint) {
24505 |         return start("Bundle", name, params);
24506 |     }
24507 |     function startProcess(Bundle storage bundle, string memory name) internal returns(uint) {
24508 |         return bundle.startProcess(name, "");
24509 |     }
24510 | 
24511 |     function finishProcess(Bundle storage bundle, uint pid) internal returns(Bundle storage) {
24512 |         finish(pid);
24513 |         return bundle;
24514 |     }
24515 | 
24516 |     /**--------------------------
24517 |         🧩 Bundle Registry
24518 |     ----------------------------*/
24519 |     function startProcess(BundleRegistry storage, string memory name, string memory params) internal returns(uint) {
24520 |         return start("BundleRegistry", name, params);
24521 |     }
24522 |     function startProcess(BundleRegistry storage bundle, string memory name) internal returns(uint) {
24523 |         return bundle.startProcess(name, "");
24524 |     }
24525 | 
24526 |     function finishProcess(BundleRegistry storage bundle, uint pid) internal returns(BundleRegistry storage) {
24527 |         finish(pid);
24528 |         return bundle;
24529 |     }
24530 |

24536 |     }

24538 |         return std.startProcess(name, "");
24539 |     }

24544 |     }

24633 |     }

24641 | }
24642 | 
24643 | /**
24644 |     Params
24645 |  */
24646 |  /* solhint-disable 2519 */
24647 | function param_27(string memory str) pure returns(string memory) {
24648 |     return str;
24649 | }
24650 | function param_9(string memory str, address addr) pure returns(string memory) {
24651 |     return str.comma(addr);
24652 | }
24653 | function param_23(string memory str, address addr, Function[] memory funcs) pure returns(string memory) {
24654 |     return str.comma(addr).comma(param_18(funcs));
24655 | }
24656 | function param_20(string memory str, bytes4 b4, address addr) pure returns(string memory) {
24657 |     return str.comma(b4).comma(addr);
24658 | }
24659 | function param_21(string memory str, Proxy_2 memory proxy) pure returns(string memory) {
24660 |     return str.comma(proxy.addr);
24661 | }
24662 | function param_14(string memory str, Dictionary_1 memory dictionary) pure returns(string memory) {
24663 |     return str.comma(dictionary.addr);
24664 | }
24665 | function param_13(string memory str, Dictionary_1 memory dictionary, bytes memory b) pure returns(string memory) {
24666 |     return str.comma(dictionary.addr).comma(string(b));
24667 | }
24668 | function param_22(string memory str, Function[] memory funcs) pure returns(string memory) {
24669 |     return str.comma(param_18(funcs));
24670 | }
24671 | function param_10(string memory str, bytes memory b) pure returns(string memory) {
24672 |     return str.comma(string(b));
24673 | }
24674 | 
24675 | function param_12(bytes4 b4) pure returns(string memory) {
24676 |     return b4.toString();
24677 | }
24678 | function param_24(bytes4 b4, address addr) pure returns(string memory) {
24679 |     return b4.toString().comma(addr);
24680 | }
24681 | 
24682 | function param_0(address addr) pure returns(string memory) {
24683 |     return addr.toString();
24684 | }
24685 | function param_5(address addr, address addr2) pure returns(string memory) {
24686 |     return addr.toString().comma(addr2);
24687 | }
24688 | function param_15(address addr, string memory str) pure returns(string memory) {
24689 |     return addr.toString().comma(str);
24690 | }
24691 | 
24692 | function param_11(Dictionary_1 memory dict) pure returns(string memory) {
24693 |     return param_27(dict.name);
24694 | }
24695 | function param_16(Dictionary_1 memory dict, address addr) pure returns(string memory) {
24696 |     return param_5(dict.addr, addr);
24697 | }
24698 | function param_17(Dictionary_1 memory dict, bytes4 b4, address addr) pure returns(string memory) {
24699 |     return param_0(dict.addr).comma(b4).comma(addr);
24700 | }
24701 | function param_2(Dictionary_1 memory dict, bytes memory b) pure returns(string memory) {
24702 |     return param_15(dict.addr, string(b));
24703 | }
24704 | function param_3(Dictionary_1 memory dict1, Dictionary_1 memory dict2) pure returns(string memory) {
24705 |     return param_5(dict1.addr, dict2.addr);
24706 | }
24707 | 
24708 | function param_6(Function memory func) pure returns(string memory) {
24709 |     return func.name;
24710 | }
24711 | function param_18(Function[] memory functions) pure returns(string memory res) {
24712 |     for (uint i; i < functions.length; ++i) {
24713 |         res = res.comma(functions[i].name);
24714 |     }
24715 | }
24716 | function param_8(Function[] memory functions, address facade) pure returns(string memory res) {
24717 |     return param_18(functions).comma(facade);
24718 | }
24719 | 
24720 | function param_25(Bundle memory bundle) pure returns(string memory) {
24721 |     return bundle.name;
24722 | }
24723 | function param_7(Bundle memory bundle, address addr) pure returns(string memory) {
24724 |     return bundle.name.comma(addr);
24725 | }
24726 | function param_26(Bundle memory bundle, bytes memory b) pure returns(string memory) {
24727 |     return bundle.name.comma(string(b));
24728 | }
24729 | function param_19(Bundle memory bundle, address addr, bytes memory b) pure returns(string memory) {
24730 |     return bundle.name.comma(addr).comma(string(b));
24731 | }
24732 | function param_1(address addr, bytes memory b) pure returns(string memory) {
24733 |     return param_0(addr).comma(string(b));
24734 | }
24735 | function param_4(bytes memory b) pure returns(string memory) {
24736 |     return string(b);
24737 | }
24738 | 
24739 | // src/devkit/system/Validator.sol
24740 | 
24741 |     using Formatter for string;
24742 | 
24743 |     using Inspector for string;
24744 |     using Inspector for bytes4;
24745 |     using Inspector for address;
24746 |     using Inspector for bool;
24747 |     using Inspector for uint256;
24748 | // Utils
24749 | 
24750 | // Core Types
24751 | 
24752 | /**==================
24753 |     ✅ Validator
24754 | ====================*/
24755 | library Validator {
24756 |     enum Type { MUST, SHOULD, COMPLETION }
24757 |     Type constant MUST = Type.MUST;
24758 |     Type constant SHOULD = Type.SHOULD;
24759 |     Type constant COMPLETION = Type.COMPLETION;
24760 | 
24761 |     function validate(Type T, bool condition, string memory messageHead, string memory messageBody) internal view returns(bool res) {
24762 |         if (condition) return true;
24763 |         if (T == COMPLETION) Logger.logDebug(Formatter.toMessage(messageHead, messageBody));
24764 |         if (T == SHOULD) Logger.logWarn(Formatter.toMessage(messageHead, messageBody));
24765 |         if (T == MUST) System.Exit(messageHead, messageBody);
24766 |     }
24767 | 
24768 |     // Validate without broadcast
24769 |     modifier noBroadcast() {
24770 |         (bool isBroadcasting, address currentSender) = ForgeHelper.pauseBroadcast();
24771 |         _;
24772 |         ForgeHelper.resumeBroadcast(isBroadcasting, currentSender);
24773 |     }
24774 | 
24775 |     /**================
24776 |         📝 Config
24777 |     ==================*/
24778 |     function SHOULD_FileExists(string memory path) internal returns(bool condition) {
24779 |         condition = vm.exists(path);
24780 |         validate(SHOULD, condition, MessageHead.CONFIG_FILE_MISSING, MessageBody.CONFIG_FILE_MISSING);
24781 |     }
24782 |     function MUST_FileExists(string memory path) internal {
24783 |         validate(MUST, vm.exists(path), MessageHead.CONFIG_FILE_REQUIRED, MessageBody.CONFIG_FILE_REQUIRED);
24784 |     }
24785 | 
24786 |     /**===================
24787 |         🧱 Primitives
24788 |     =====================*/
24789 |     function MUST_NotEmptyName(string memory name) internal view {
24790 |         validate(MUST, name.isNotEmpty(), MessageHead.NAME_REQUIRED, MessageBody.NAME_REQUIRED);
24791 |     }
24792 |     function MUST_NotEmptyEnvKey(string memory envKey) internal view {
24793 |         validate(MUST, envKey.isNotEmpty(), MessageHead.ENV_KEY_REQUIRED, MessageBody.ENV_KEY_REQUIRED);
24794 |     }
24795 |     function SHOULD_NotEmptySelector(bytes4 selector) internal view {
24796 |         validate(SHOULD, selector.isNotEmpty(), MessageHead.SELECTOR_RECOMMENDED, MessageBody.SELECTOR_RECOMMENDED);
24797 |     }
24798 |     function MUST_AddressIsContract(address addr) internal view {
24799 |         validate(MUST, addr.isContract(), MessageHead.ADDRESS_NOT_CONTRACT, MessageBody.ADDRESS_NOT_CONTRACT);
24800 |     }
24801 |     function SHOULD_FacadeIsContract(address facade) internal view {
24802 |         validate(SHOULD, facade.isContract(), MessageHead.FACADE_NOT_CONTRACT, MessageBody.FACADE_NOT_CONTRACT);
24803 |     }
24804 |     function SHOULD_OwnerIsNotZeroAddress(address owner) internal view {
24805 |         validate(MUST, owner.isNotZero(), MessageHead.OWNER_ZERO_ADDRESS_RECOMMENDED, MessageBody.OWNER_ZERO_ADDRESS_RECOMMENDED);
24806 |     }
24807 | 
24808 |     /**======================
24809 |         📸 Current Context
24810 |     ========================*/
24811 |     function MUST_NameFound(Current storage current) internal view {
24812 |         validate(MUST, current.name.isAssigned(), MessageHead.CURRENT_NAME_NOT_FOUND, MessageBody.CURRENT_NAME_NOT_FOUND);
24813 |     }
24814 | 
24815 |     /**==================
24816 |         🧩 Function
24817 |     ====================*/
24818 |     function ValidateBuilder(Function storage func) internal view returns(bool) {
24819 |         return (
24820 |             validate(COMPLETION, func.name.isAssigned(), MessageHead.FUNC_NAME_UNASSIGNED, MessageBody.FUNC_NAME_UNASSIGNED) &&
24821 |             validate(COMPLETION, func.implementation.isContract(), MessageHead.FUNC_CONTRACT_UNASSIGNED, MessageBody.FUNC_CONTRACT_UNASSIGNED)
24822 |         );
24823 |     }
24824 |     function MUST_Completed(Function memory func) internal view {
24825 |         validate(MUST, func.isComplete(), MessageHead.FUNC_NOT_COMPLETE, MessageBody.FUNC_NOT_COMPLETE);
24826 |     }
24827 |     function MUST_NotLocked(Function storage func) internal view {
24828 |         validate(MUST, func.status.isNotLocked(), MessageHead.FUNC_LOCKED, MessageBody.FUNC_LOCKED);
24829 |     }
24830 |     function MUST_Building(Function storage func) internal view {
24831 |         validate(MUST, func.status.isBuilding(), MessageHead.FUNC_NOT_BUILDING, MessageBody.FUNC_NOT_BUILDING);
24832 |     }
24833 |     function MUST_Built(Function storage func) internal view {
24834 |         validate(MUST, func.status.isBuilt(), MessageHead.FUNC_NOT_BUILT, MessageBody.FUNC_NOT_BUILT);
24835 |     }
24836 |     /* 📗 Functions Registry */
24837 |     function MUST_Registered(FunctionRegistry storage registry, string memory name) internal view {
24838 |         validate(MUST, registry.functions[name].isComplete(), MessageHead.FUNC_NOT_REGISTERED, MessageBody.FUNC_NOT_REGISTERED);
24839 |     }
24840 | 
24841 |     /**===============
24842 |         🗂️ Bundle
24843 |     =================*/
24844 |     function ValidateBuilder(Bundle storage bundle) internal view returns(bool) {
24845 |         return (
24846 |             validate(COMPLETION, bundle.name.isNotEmpty(), MessageHead.BUNDLE_NAME_UNASSIGNED, MessageBody.BUNDLE_NAME_UNASSIGNED) &&
24847 |             validate(COMPLETION, bundle.functions.length.isNotZero(), MessageHead.NO_FUNCTIONS_IN_BUNDLE, MessageBody.NO_FUNCTIONS_IN_BUNDLE) &&
24848 |             validate(COMPLETION, bundle.facade.isContract(), MessageHead.BUNDLE_FACADE_UNASSIGNED, MessageBody.BUNDLE_FACADE_UNASSIGNED)
24849 |         );
24850 |     }
24851 |     function MUST_NotInitialized(Bundle storage bundle) internal view {
24852 |         validate(MUST, bundle.status.isUninitialized(), MessageHead.BUNDLE_NOT_INITIALIZED, MessageBody.BUNDLE_NOT_INITIALIZED);
24853 |     }
24854 |     function SHOULD_Completed(Bundle storage bundle) internal view {
24855 |         validate(SHOULD, bundle.isComplete(), MessageHead.BUNDLE_NOT_COMPLETE, MessageBody.BUNDLE_NOT_COMPLETE);
24856 |     }
24857 |     function MUST_Completed(Bundle storage bundle) internal view {
24858 |         validate(MUST, bundle.name.isNotEmpty(), MessageHead.BUNDLE_NAME_UNASSIGNED, MessageBody.BUNDLE_NAME_UNASSIGNED);
24859 |         validate(MUST, bundle.functions.length.isNotZero(), MessageHead.NO_FUNCTIONS_IN_BUNDLE, MessageBody.NO_FUNCTIONS_IN_BUNDLE);
24860 |         validate(MUST, bundle.facade.isContract(), MessageHead.BUNDLE_FACADE_UNASSIGNED, MessageBody.BUNDLE_FACADE_UNASSIGNED);
24861 |     }
24862 |     function MUST_HaveFunction(Bundle storage bundle) internal view {
24863 |         validate(MUST, bundle.functions.length.isNotZero(), MessageHead.NO_FUNCTIONS_IN_BUNDLE, MessageBody.NO_FUNCTIONS_IN_BUNDLE_REQUIRED);
24864 |     }
24865 |     function MUST_HaveUniqueSelector(Bundle storage bundle, Function storage func) internal view {
24866 |         validate(MUST, bundle.hasNotSameSelector(func), MessageHead.BUNDLE_CONTAINS_SAME_SELECTOR, MessageBody.BUNDLE_CONTAINS_SAME_SELECTOR);
24867 |     }
24868 |     function MUST_NotLocked(Bundle storage bundle) internal view {
24869 |         validate(MUST, bundle.status.isNotLocked(), MessageHead.BUNDLE_LOCKED, MessageBody.BUNDLE_LOCKED);
24870 |     }
24871 |     function MUST_Building(Bundle storage bundle) internal view {
24872 |         validate(MUST, bundle.status.isBuilding(), MessageHead.BUNDLE_NOT_BUILDING, MessageBody.BUNDLE_NOT_BUILDING);
24873 |     }
24874 |     function MUST_Built(Bundle storage bundle) internal view {
24875 |         validate(MUST, bundle.status.isBuilt(), MessageHead.BUNDLE_NOT_BUILT, MessageBody.BUNDLE_NOT_BUILT);
24876 |     }
24877 |     /* 📙 Bundle Registry */
24878 |     function SHOULD_ExistCurrentBundle(BundleRegistry storage registry) internal view returns(bool condition) {
24879 |         condition = registry.current.name.isNotEmpty();
24880 |         validate(SHOULD, condition, MessageHead.CURRENT_BUNDLE_NOT_EXIST, MessageBody.CURRENT_BUNDLE_NOT_EXIST);
24881 |     }
24882 |     function MUST_ExistCurrentName(BundleRegistry storage registry) internal view {
24883 |         validate(MUST, registry.current.name.isAssigned(), MessageHead.CURRENT_BUNDLE_NOT_EXIST, MessageBody.CURRENT_BUNDLE_NOT_EXIST_REQUIRED);
24884 |     }
24885 | 
24886 |     /**==============
24887 |         🏠 Proxy
24888 |     ================*/
24889 |     function ValidateBuilder(Proxy_2 memory proxy) internal view returns(bool) {
24890 |         return (
24891 |             validate(MUST, proxy.addr.isContract(), MessageHead.PROXY_ADDR_UNASSIGNED, MessageBody.PROXY_ADDR_UNASSIGNED) &&
24892 |             validate(MUST, proxy.kind.isNotUndefined(), MessageHead.PROXY_KIND_UNDEFINED, MessageBody.PROXY_KIND_UNDEFINED)
24893 |         );
24894 |     }
24895 |     function MUST_Completed(Proxy_2 memory proxy) internal view {
24896 |         validate(MUST, proxy.isComplete(), MessageHead.PROXY_NOT_COMPLETE, MessageBody.PROXY_NOT_COMPLETE);
24897 |     }
24898 |     function MUST_NotLocked(Proxy_2 memory proxy) internal view {
24899 |         validate(MUST, proxy.status.isNotLocked(), MessageHead.PROXY_LOCKED, MessageBody.PROXY_LOCKED);
24900 |     }
24901 |     function MUST_Building(Proxy_2 memory proxy) internal view {
24902 |         validate(MUST, proxy.status.isBuilding(), MessageHead.PROXY_NOT_BUILDING, MessageBody.PROXY_NOT_BUILDING);
24903 |     }
24904 |     function MUST_Built(Proxy_2 memory proxy) internal view {
24905 |         validate(MUST, proxy.status.isBuilt(), MessageHead.PROXY_NOT_BUILT, MessageBody.PROXY_NOT_BUILT);
24906 |     }
24907 |     /* 📕 Proxy Registry */
24908 |     function MUST_Registered(ProxyRegistry storage registry, string memory name) internal view {
24909 |         validate(MUST, registry.proxies[name].isComplete(), MessageHead.PROXY_NOT_REGISTERED, MessageBody.PROXY_NOT_REGISTERED);
24910 |     }
24911 |     function MUST_NotRegistered(ProxyRegistry storage registry, string memory name) internal view {
24912 |         validate(MUST, registry.proxies[name].isUninitialized(), MessageHead.PROXY_ALREADY_REGISTERED, MessageBody.PROXY_ALREADY_REGISTERED);
24913 |     }
24914 |     function MUST_ExistCurrentName(ProxyRegistry storage registry) internal view {
24915 |         validate(MUST, registry.current.name.isAssigned(), MessageHead.CURRENT_PROXY_NOT_EXIST, MessageBody.CURRENT_PROXY_NOT_EXIST);
24916 |     }
24917 | 
24918 |     /**====================
24919 |         📚 Dictionary
24920 |     ======================*/
24921 |     function ValidateBuilder(Dictionary_1 memory dictionary) internal view returns(bool) {
24922 |         return (
24923 |             validate(COMPLETION, dictionary.name.isNotEmpty(), MessageHead.DICTIONARY_NAME_UNASSIGNED, MessageBody.DICTIONARY_NAME_UNASSIGNED) &&
24924 |             validate(COMPLETION, dictionary.addr.isContract(), MessageHead.DICTIONARY_ADDR_UNASSIGNED, MessageBody.DICTIONARY_ADDR_UNASSIGNED) &&
24925 |             validate(COMPLETION, dictionary.kind.isNotUndefined(), MessageHead.DICTIONARY_KIND_UNDEFINED, MessageBody.DICTIONARY_KIND_UNDEFINED)
24926 |         );
24927 |     }
24928 |     function MUST_Completed(Dictionary_1 memory dictionary) internal view {
24929 |         validate(MUST, dictionary.isComplete(), MessageHead.DICTIONARY_NOT_COMPLETE, MessageBody.DICTIONARY_NOT_COMPLETE);
24930 |     }
24931 |     function MUST_Verifiable(Dictionary_1 memory dictionary) internal noBroadcast {
24932 |         validate(MUST, dictionary.isVerifiable(), MessageHead.DICTIONARY_NOT_VERIFIABLE, MessageBody.DICTIONARY_NOT_VERIFIABLE);
24933 |     }
24934 |     function MUST_NotLocked(Dictionary_1 memory dictionary) internal view {
24935 |         validate(MUST, dictionary.status.isNotLocked(), MessageHead.DICTIONARY_LOCKED, MessageBody.DICTIONARY_LOCKED);
24936 |     }
24937 |     function MUST_Building(Dictionary_1 memory dictionary) internal view {
24938 |         validate(MUST, dictionary.status.isBuilding(), MessageHead.DICTIONARY_NOT_BUILDING, MessageBody.DICTIONARY_NOT_BUILDING);
24939 |     }
24940 |     function MUST_Built(Dictionary_1 memory dictionary) internal view {
24941 |         validate(MUST, dictionary.status.isBuilt(), MessageHead.DICTIONARY_NOT_BUILT, MessageBody.DICTIONARY_NOT_BUILT);
24942 |     }
24943 |     /* 📘 Dictionary Registry */
24944 |     function MUST_Registered(DictionaryRegistry storage registry, string memory name) internal view {
24945 |         validate(MUST, registry.dictionaries[name].isComplete(), MessageHead.DICTIONARY_NOT_REGISTERED, MessageBody.DICTIONARY_NOT_REGISTERED);
24946 |     }
24947 |     function MUST_NotRegistered(DictionaryRegistry storage registry, string memory name) internal view {
24948 |         validate(MUST, registry.dictionaries[name].isUninitialized(), MessageHead.DICTIONARY_ALREADY_REGISTERED, MessageBody.DICTIONARY_ALREADY_REGISTERED);
24949 |     }

24951 |         validate(MUST, registry.current.name.isAssigned(), MessageHead.CURRENT_DICTIONARY_NOT_EXIST, MessageBody.CURRENT_DICTIONARY_NOT_EXIST);
24952 |     }
24953 | 
24954 |     /**==========================
24955 |         🏛 Standard Registry
24956 |     ============================*/
24957 |     function ValidateBuilder(StdRegistry storage registry) internal view returns(bool) {
24958 |         return (
24959 |             Validator.ValidateBuilder(registry.functions) &&
24960 |             Validator.ValidateBuilder(registry.all)
24961 |         );
24962 |     }
24963 |     function MUST_Completed(StdRegistry storage registry) internal view {
24964 |         validate(MUST, registry.status.isComplete(), MessageHead.STD_REGISTRY_NOT_COMPLETE, MessageBody.STD_REGISTRY_NOT_COMPLETE);
24965 |     }
24966 |     function MUST_NotLocked(StdRegistry storage registry) internal view {
24967 |         validate(MUST, registry.status.isNotLocked(), MessageHead.STD_REGISTRY_LOCKED, MessageBody.STD_REGISTRY_LOCKED);
24968 |     }
24969 |     function MUST_Building(StdRegistry storage registry) internal view {
24970 |         validate(MUST, registry.status.isBuilding(), MessageHead.STD_REGISTRY_NOT_BUILDING, MessageBody.STD_REGISTRY_NOT_BUILDING);
24971 |     }
24972 |     function MUST_Built(StdRegistry memory registry) internal view {
24973 |         validate(MUST, registry.status.isBuilt(), MessageHead.STD_REGISTRY_NOT_BUILT, MessageBody.STD_REGISTRY_NOT_BUILT);
24974 |     }
24975 |     /**==========================
24976 |         🏰 Standard Functions
24977 |     ============================*/
24978 |     function ValidateBuilder(StdFunctions storage std) internal view returns(bool) {
24979 |         return (
24980 |             Validator.ValidateBuilder(std.initSetAdmin) &&
24981 |             Validator.ValidateBuilder(std.getFunctions) &&
24982 |             Validator.ValidateBuilder(std.clone)
24983 |         );
24984 |     }
24985 |     function MUST_Completed(StdFunctions storage std) internal view {
24986 |         validate(MUST, std.status.isComplete(), MessageHead.STD_FUNCTIONS_NOT_COMPLETE, MessageBody.STD_FUNCTIONS_NOT_COMPLETE);
24987 |     }
24988 |     function MUST_NotLocked(StdFunctions storage std) internal view {
24989 |         validate(MUST, std.status.isNotLocked(), MessageHead.STD_FUNCTIONS_LOCKED, MessageBody.STD_FUNCTIONS_LOCKED);
24990 |     }
24991 |     function MUST_Building(StdFunctions storage std) internal view {
24992 |         validate(MUST, std.status.isBuilding(), MessageHead.STD_FUNCTIONS_NOT_BUILDING, MessageBody.STD_FUNCTIONS_NOT_BUILDING);
24993 |     }
24994 |     function MUST_Built(StdFunctions memory std) internal view {
24995 |         validate(MUST, std.status.isBuilt(), MessageHead.STD_FUNCTIONS_NOT_BUILT, MessageBody.STD_FUNCTIONS_NOT_BUILT);
24996 |     }
24997 | 
24998 |     /**=======================
24999 |         🏷️ Name Generator
25000 |     =========================*/
25001 |     function MUST_FoundInRange() internal view {
25002 |         validate(MUST, false, MessageHead.NOT_FOUND_IN_RANGE, MessageBody.NOT_FOUND_IN_RANGE);
25003 |     }
25004 | 
25005 |     /**================
25006 |         🧪 MCTest
25007 |     ==================*/
25008 |     function MUST_UseFunctionContract(address implementation) internal view {
25009 |         validate(MUST, implementation.isContract(), MessageHead.TEST_MUST_USE_FUNCTION, MessageBody.TEST_MUST_USE_FUNCTION);
25010 |     }
25011 | 
25012 | }
25013 |

25026 |             _setImplementation(functions[i].selector, functions[i].implementation);

25033 | // src/devkit/test/mocks/SimpleMockProxy.sol
25034 | 
25035 | // Core
25036 | 
25037 | // External Lib
25038 | 
25039 | /**
25040 |     @title Mock Proxy Contract
25041 |  */
25042 | contract SimpleMockProxy is Proxy_0 {
25043 |     constructor (Function[] memory functions) {
25044 |         for (uint i; i < functions.length; ++i) {
25045 |             SimpleMockProxyLib.set({
25046 |                 selector: functions[i].selector,
25047 |                 implementation: functions[i].implementation
25048 |             });
25049 |         }
25050 |     }
25051 | 
25052 |     function _implementation() internal view override returns(address) {
25053 |         return SimpleMockProxyLib.getImplementation(msg.sig);
25054 |     }
25055 | }
25056 | 
25057 | library SimpleMockProxyLib {
25058 |     bytes32 internal constant STORAGE_LOCATION = 0x64a9f0903a8f864d59bc40808555c0090d6ada027fd81884feeb2af9acdbc200;
25059 |     /// @custom:storage-location erc7021:mc.mock.proxy
25060 |     struct SimpleMockProxyStorage {
25061 |         mapping(bytes4 selector => address) implementations;
25062 |     }
25063 |     function Storage() internal pure returns(SimpleMockProxyStorage storage ref) { assembly { ref.slot := STORAGE_LOCATION } }
25064 | 
25065 |     function set(bytes4 selector, address implementation) internal {
25066 |         Storage().implementations[selector] = implementation;
25067 |     }
25068 | 
25069 |     function getImplementation(bytes4 selector) internal view returns(address) {
25070 |         return Storage().implementations[selector];
25071 |     }
25072 | 
25073 |     // function getOpAddressLocation(bytes4 selector) internal  returns(bytes32) {
25074 |     //     return keccak256(abi.encodePacked(bytes32(selector), bytes32(0x64a9f0903a8f864d59bc40808555c0090d6ada027fd81884feeb2af9acdbc200)));
25075 |     // }
25076 | }

25078 | // src/devkit/types/Formatter.sol
25079 | 
25080 | // Forge-std
25081 | 
25082 | // Core Types
25083 | 
25084 | // Utils
25085 | 
25086 | /**==================
25087 |     🗒️ Formatter
25088 | ====================*/
25089 | library Formatter {
25090 |     using Formatter for string;
25091 |     using Formatter for bytes4;
25092 |     using Formatter for address;
25093 |     using StdStyle for string;
25094 | 
25095 |     /**==================
25096 |         🧩 Function
25097 |     ====================*/
25098 |     function toString(Function memory func) internal pure returns(string memory message) {
25099 |         return message  .append("Impl: ").append(func.implementation).comma()
25100 |                         .append("Selector: ").append(func.selector).comma()
25101 |                         .append("Name: ").append(func.name);
25102 |     }
25103 | 
25104 |     /**===============
25105 |         🗂️ Bundle
25106 |     =================*/
25107 |     function toString(Bundle storage bundle) internal view returns(string memory message) {
25108 |         message = message.append("Facade: ").append(bundle.facade);
25109 |         Function[] memory _funcs = bundle.functions;
25110 |         for (uint i; i < _funcs.length; ++i) {
25111 |             message = message.br().append(toString(_funcs[i]));
25112 |         }
25113 |     }
25114 | 
25115 |     /**=================
25116 |         ⛓️ Process
25117 |     ===================*/
25118 |     function toLocation(Process memory process) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25119 |         string memory at = "\t    at ";
25120 |         return at.append(process.libName.dot().append(process.funcName.addParens())).dim().br();
25121 |     }
25122 | 
25123 |     function formatPid(uint pid) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25124 |         string memory PID = "pid:";
25125 |         string memory strPid = vm.toString(pid);
25126 |         string memory paddedPid = pid < 10 ? string.concat("0", strPid) : strPid;
25127 |         return PID.append(paddedPid).sp();
25128 |     }
25129 | 
25130 |     function toStart(Process memory process, uint pid) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25131 |         string memory header = formatPid(pid);
25132 |         string memory nest;
25133 |         for (uint i; i <= process.nest; ++i) {
25134 |             nest = string.concat(nest, "> ");
25135 |         }
25136 |         return header.append(nest.dim()).append(process.libName.dot().append(process.funcName)).append(process.params.parens().dim().italic());
25137 |     }
25138 | 
25139 |     function toFinish(Process memory process, uint pid) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25140 |         string memory header = formatPid(pid);
25141 |         string memory nest;
25142 |         for (uint i; i <= process.nest; ++i) {
25143 |             nest = string.concat(nest, "< ");
25144 |         }
25145 |         return header.append(nest).append(process.libName.dot().append(process.funcName.addParens())).dim();
25146 |     }
25147 | 
25148 |     function toMessage(string memory head, string memory body) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25149 |         return head.sp().append(body);
25150 |     }
25151 | 
25152 |     /**===================
25153 |         🧱 Primitives
25154 |     =====================*/
25155 |     /// 📝 String
25156 |     function append(string memory str, string memory addition) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25157 |         return string.concat(str, addition);
25158 |     }
25159 |     function append(string memory str, address addr) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25160 |         return str.append(vm.toString(addr));
25161 |     }
25162 |     function append(string memory str, bytes4 selector) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25163 |         return str.append(selector.toString());
25164 |     }
25165 |     function append(string memory str, uint num) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25166 |         return str.append(vm.toString(num));
25167 |     }
25168 | 
25169 |     function br(string memory str) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25170 |         return string.concat(str, "\n");
25171 |     }
25172 |     function sp(string memory str) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25173 |         return string.concat(str, " ");
25174 |     }
25175 |     function indent(string memory str) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25176 |         return string.concat(str, "\t");
25177 |     }
25178 |     function comma(string memory str) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25179 |         return string.concat(str, ", ");
25180 |     }
25181 |     function comma(string memory str, string memory addition) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25182 |         return string.concat(str, ", ", addition);
25183 |     }
25184 |     function comma(string memory str, bytes4 b4) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25185 |         return string.concat(str, ", ", b4.toString());
25186 |     }
25187 |     function comma(string memory str, address addr) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25188 |         return string.concat(str, ", ", addr.toString());
25189 |     }
25190 |     function dot(string memory str) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25191 |         return string.concat(str, ".");
25192 |     }
25193 |     function addParens(string memory str) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25194 |         return string.concat(str, "()");
25195 |     }
25196 |     function parens(string memory str) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25197 |         return string.concat("(", str, ")");
25198 |     }
25199 |     function brackL(string memory str) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25200 |         return string.concat("[", str);
25201 |     }
25202 |     function brackR(string memory str) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25203 |         return string.concat(str, "]");
25204 |     }
25205 | 
25206 |     function toSequential(string memory str, uint i) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25207 |         return i == 1 ? str : str.append(i);
25208 |     }
25209 | 
25210 |     function toString(address addr) internal pure returns(string memory) {
25211 |         return vm.toString(addr);
25212 |     }
25213 | 
25214 |     function toBytes32(address addr) internal pure returns(bytes32) {
25215 |         return bytes32(uint256(uint160(addr)));
25216 |     }
25217 | 
25218 |     function toString(bytes4 selector) internal pure returns (string memory) {
25219 |         return vm.toString(selector).substring(10);
25220 |     }
25221 | 
25222 |     function toBytes(string memory str) internal pure returns (bytes memory) {
25223 |         return bytes(str);
25224 |     }
25225 | 
25226 |     function substring(string memory str, uint n) internal pure returns (string memory) {
25227 |         bytes memory strBytes = bytes(str);
25228 |         bytes memory result = new bytes(n);
25229 |         for(uint i = 0; i < n; i++) {
25230 |             result[i] = strBytes[i];
25231 |         }
25232 |         return string(result);
25233 |     }
25234 | 
25235 | }
25236 | 
25237 | // src/devkit/types/Inspector.sol
25238 | 
25239 | // External Library
25240 | 
25241 | // Core Types
25242 | 
25243 | /**===================
25244 |     🕵️‍♀️ Inspector
25245 | =====================*/
25246 | library Inspector {
25247 |     using Inspector for string;
25248 |     using Inspector for bytes4;
25249 |     using Inspector for address;
25250 |     using Inspector for bool;
25251 | 
25252 |     /**==================
25253 |         🧩 Function
25254 |     ====================*/
25255 |     function hasNotContract(Function storage func) internal view returns(bool) {
25256 |         return func.implementation.isNotContract();
25257 |     }
25258 |     function isEqual(Function memory a, Function memory b) internal pure returns(bool) {
25259 |         return keccak256(abi.encode(a)) == keccak256(abi.encode(b));
25260 |     }
25261 |     function isComplete(Function memory func) internal pure returns(bool) {
25262 |         return func.status.isComplete();
25263 |     }
25264 |     function isUninitialized(Function storage func) internal view returns(bool) {
25265 |         return func.status.isUninitialized();
25266 |     }
25267 | 
25268 |     /**===============
25269 |         🗂️ Bundle
25270 |     =================*/
25271 |     function hasSameSelector(Bundle storage bundle, Function storage func) internal view returns(bool flag) {
25272 |         for (uint i; i < bundle.functions.length; ++i) {
25273 |             if (func.selector == bundle.functions[i].selector) return true;
25274 |         }
25275 |     }
25276 |     function hasNotSameSelector(Bundle storage bundle, Function storage func) internal view returns(bool) {
25277 |         return hasSameSelector(bundle, func).isFalse();
25278 |     }
25279 |     function isComplete(Bundle storage bundle) internal view returns(bool) {
25280 |         return bundle.status.isComplete();
25281 |     }
25282 |     function isUninitialized(Bundle storage bundle) internal view returns(bool) {
25283 |         return bundle.status.isUninitialized();
25284 |     }
25285 |     /**=======================
25286 |         📙 Bundle Registry
25287 |     =========================*/
25288 |     function hasCurrentBundle(BundleRegistry storage bundle) internal view returns(bool) {
25289 |         return bundle.current.name.isNotEmpty();
25290 |     }
25291 |     function hasNotCurrentBundle(BundleRegistry storage bundle) internal view returns(bool) {
25292 |         return bundle.hasCurrentBundle().isNot();
25293 |     }
25294 | 
25295 |     /**==============
25296 |         🏠 Proxy
25297 |     ================*/
25298 |     function isComplete(Proxy_2 memory proxy) internal pure returns(bool) {
25299 |         return proxy.status.isComplete();
25300 |     }
25301 |     function isInitialized(Proxy_2 storage proxy) internal view returns(bool) {
25302 |         return proxy.status.isInitialized();
25303 |     }
25304 |     function isUninitialized(Proxy_2 storage proxy) internal view returns(bool) {
25305 |         return proxy.status.isUninitialized();
25306 |     }
25307 |     /**~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
25308 |         🏠 Proxy Kind
25309 |     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/
25310 |     function isNotUndefined(ProxyKind kind) internal pure returns(bool) {
25311 |         return kind != ProxyKind.undefined;
25312 |     }
25313 | 
25314 |     /**====================
25315 |         📚 Dictionary
25316 |     ======================*/
25317 |     function isSupported(Dictionary_1 memory dictionary, bytes4 selector) internal view returns(bool) {
25318 |         return IDictionary(dictionary.addr).supportsInterface(selector);
25319 |     }
25320 |     function isVerifiable(Dictionary_1 memory dictionary) internal returns(bool) {
25321 |         (bool success,) = dictionary.addr.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(IBeacon.implementation.selector));
25322 |         return success;
25323 |     }
25324 |     function isComplete(Dictionary_1 memory dictionary) internal pure returns(bool) {
25325 |         return dictionary.status.isComplete();
25326 |     }
25327 |     function isUninitialized(Dictionary_1 storage dictionary) internal view returns(bool) {
25328 |         return dictionary.status.isUninitialized();
25329 |     }
25330 |     /**------------------------
25331 |         📚 Dictionary Kind
25332 |     --------------------------*/
25333 |     function isNotUndefined(DictionaryKind kind) internal pure returns(bool) {
25334 |         return kind != DictionaryKind.undefined;
25335 |     }
25336 | 
25337 |     /**===================
25338 |         🧱 Primitives
25339 |     =====================*/
25340 |     /// 📝 String
25341 |     function isAssigned(string storage str) internal pure returns(bool) {
25342 |         return str.isNotEmpty();
25343 |     }
25344 |     function isEmpty(string memory str) internal pure returns(bool) {
25345 |         return bytes(str).length == 0;
25346 |     }
25347 |     function isNotEmpty(string memory str) internal pure returns(bool) {
25348 |         return str.isEmpty().isNot();
25349 |     }
25350 |     function isEqual(string memory a, string memory b) internal pure returns(bool) {
25351 |         return keccak256(abi.encode(a)) == keccak256(abi.encode(b));
25352 |     }
25353 |     function isNotEqual(string memory a, string memory b) internal pure returns(bool) {
25354 |         return a.isEqual(b).isNot();
25355 |     }
25356 |     /// 💾 Bytes4
25357 |     function isAssigned(bytes4 selector) internal pure returns(bool) {
25358 |         return selector.isNotEmpty();
25359 |     }
25360 |     function isEmpty(bytes4 selector) internal pure returns(bool) {
25361 |         return selector == bytes4(0);
25362 |     }
25363 |     function isNotEmpty(bytes4 selector) internal pure returns(bool) {
25364 |         return selector.isEmpty().isFalse();
25365 |     }
25366 |     function isEqual(bytes4 a, bytes4 b) internal pure returns(bool) {
25367 |         return a == b;
25368 |     }
25369 |     function isNotEqual(bytes4 a, bytes4 b) internal pure returns(bool) {
25370 |         return a.isEqual(b).isFalse();
25371 |     }
25372 |     /// 📌 Address
25373 |     function isZero(address addr) internal pure returns(bool) {
25374 |         return addr == address(0);
25375 |     }
25376 |     function isNotZero(address addr) internal pure returns(bool) {
25377 |         return addr.isZero().isNot();
25378 |     }
25379 |     function hasCode(address addr) internal view returns(bool) {
25380 |         return addr.code.length != 0;
25381 |     }
25382 |     function hasNotCode(address addr) internal view returns(bool) {
25383 |         return addr.hasCode().isNot();
25384 |     }
25385 |     function isContract(address addr) internal view returns(bool) {
25386 |         return addr.hasCode();
25387 |     }
25388 |     function isNotContract(address addr) internal view returns(bool) {
25389 |         return addr.isContract().isNot();
25390 |     }
25391 |     /// ✅ Bool
25392 |     function isNot(bool flag) internal pure returns(bool) {
25393 |         return !flag;
25394 |     }
25395 |     function isFalse(bool flag) internal pure returns(bool) {
25396 |         return flag == false;
25397 |     }
25398 |     /// #️⃣ Uint
25399 |     function isNotZero(uint256 num) internal pure returns(bool) {
25400 |         return num != 0;
25401 |     }
25402 | 
25403 |     /**===================
25404 |         🔒 Type Guard
25405 |     =====================*/
25406 |     function isUninitialized(TypeStatus status) internal pure returns(bool) {
25407 |         return status == TypeStatus.Uninitialized;
25408 |     }
25409 |     function isInitialized(TypeStatus status) internal pure returns(bool) {
25410 |         return status != TypeStatus.Uninitialized;
25411 |     }
25412 |     function isBuilding(TypeStatus status) internal pure returns(bool) {
25413 |         return status == TypeStatus.Building;
25414 |     }
25415 |     function isBuilt(TypeStatus status) internal pure returns(bool) {
25416 |         return status == TypeStatus.Built;
25417 |     }
25418 |     function isLocked(TypeStatus status) internal pure returns(bool) {
25419 |         return status == TypeStatus.Locked;
25420 |     }
25421 |     function isNotLocked(TypeStatus status) internal pure returns(bool) {
25422 |         return status.isLocked().isNot();
25423 |     }
25424 |     function isComplete(TypeStatus status) internal pure returns(bool) {
25425 |         return status.isBuilt() || status.isLocked();
25426 |     }
25427 | 
25428 | }
25429 | 
25430 | // src/devkit/types/Parser.sol
25431 | 
25432 |     using Inspector for string;
25433 | 
25434 | /**===============
25435 |     🗒️ Parser
25436 | =================*/
25437 | library Parser {
25438 |     /**===============
25439 |         📊 Logger
25440 |     =================*/
25441 |     function toLogLevel(string memory str) internal pure returns(Logger.Level) {
25442 |         if (str.isEqual("Debug")) return Logger.Level.Debug;
25443 |         if (str.isEqual("Info")) return Logger.Level.Info;
25444 |         if (str.isEqual("Warn")) return Logger.Level.Warn;
25445 |         if (str.isEqual("Error")) return Logger.Level.Error;
25446 |         return Logger.Level.Critical;
25447 |     }
25448 | }
