25450 | // src/devkit/types/TypeGuard.sol
25451 | 
25452 | // Core Types
25453 | 
25454 | using Inspector for TypeStatus global;
25455 | enum TypeStatus { Uninitialized, Building, Built, Locked }
25456 | 
25457 | /**==================================================
25458 |     🔒 Type Guard
25459 |     @dev See details in docs/object_lifecycle.md
25460 | ====================================================*/
25461 | library TypeGuard {
25462 |     using Inspector for bool;
25463 | 
25464 |     /**==================
25465 |         🧩 Function
25466 |     ====================*/
25467 |     function startBuilding(Function storage func) internal returns(Function storage) {
25468 |         uint pid = func.startProcess("startBuilding");
25469 |         Validator.MUST_NotLocked(func);
25470 |         func.status = TypeStatus.Building;
25471 |         return func.finishProcess(pid);
25472 |     }
25473 |     function finishBuilding(Function storage func) internal returns(Function storage) {
25474 |         uint pid = func.startProcess("finishBuilding");
25475 |         Validator.MUST_Building(func);
25476 |         if (Validator.ValidateBuilder(func)) func.status = TypeStatus.Built;
25477 |         return func.finishProcess(pid);
25478 |     }
25479 |     function lock(Function storage func) internal returns(Function storage) {
25480 |         uint pid = func.startProcess("lock");
25481 |         Validator.MUST_Built(func);
25482 |         func.status = TypeStatus.Locked;
25483 |         return func.finishProcess(pid);
25484 |     }
25485 | 
25486 |     /**================
25487 |         🗂️ Bundle
25488 |     ==================*/
25489 |     function startBuilding(Bundle storage bundle) internal returns(Bundle storage) {
25490 |         uint pid = bundle.startProcess("startBuilding");
25491 |         Validator.MUST_NotLocked(bundle);
25492 |         bundle.status = TypeStatus.Building;
25493 |         return bundle.finishProcess(pid);
25494 |     }
25495 |     function finishBuilding(Bundle storage bundle) internal returns(Bundle storage) {
25496 |         uint pid = bundle.startProcess("finishBuilding");
25497 |         Validator.MUST_Building(bundle);
25498 |         if (Validator.ValidateBuilder(bundle)) bundle.status = TypeStatus.Built;
25499 |         return bundle.finishProcess(pid);
25500 |     }
25501 |     function lock(Bundle storage bundle) internal returns(Bundle storage) {
25502 |         uint pid = bundle.startProcess("lock");
25503 |         Validator.MUST_Built(bundle);
25504 |         bundle.status = TypeStatus.Locked;
25505 |         return bundle.finishProcess(pid);
25506 |     }
25507 | 
25508 |     /**===============
25509 |         🏠 Proxy
25510 |     =================*/
25511 |     function startBuilding(Proxy_2 memory proxy) internal returns(Proxy_2 memory) {
25512 |         uint pid = proxy.startProcess("startBuilding");
25513 |         Validator.MUST_NotLocked(proxy);
25514 |         proxy.status = TypeStatus.Building;
25515 |         return proxy.finishProcess(pid);
25516 |     }
25517 |     function finishBuilding(Proxy_2 memory proxy) internal returns(Proxy_2 memory) {
25518 |         uint pid = proxy.startProcess("finishBuilding");
25519 |         Validator.MUST_Building(proxy);
25520 |         if (Validator.ValidateBuilder(proxy)) proxy.status = TypeStatus.Built;
25521 |         return proxy.finishProcess(pid);
25522 |     }
25523 |     function lock(Proxy_2 storage proxy) internal returns(Proxy_2 storage) {
25524 |         uint pid = proxy.startProcess("lock");
25525 |         Validator.MUST_Built(proxy);
25526 |         proxy.status = TypeStatus.Locked;
25527 |         return proxy.finishProcessInStorage(pid);
25528 |     }
25529 | 
25530 |     /**====================
25531 |         📚 Dictionary
25532 |     ======================*/
25533 |     function startBuilding(Dictionary_1 memory dictionary) internal returns(Dictionary_1 memory) {
25534 |         uint pid = dictionary.startProcess("startBuilding");
25535 |         Validator.MUST_NotLocked(dictionary);
25536 |         dictionary.status = TypeStatus.Building;
25537 |         return dictionary.finishProcess(pid);
25538 |     }
25539 |     function finishBuilding(Dictionary_1 memory dictionary) internal returns(Dictionary_1 memory) {
25540 |         uint pid = dictionary.startProcess("finishBuilding");
25541 |         Validator.MUST_Building(dictionary);
25542 |         if (Validator.ValidateBuilder(dictionary)) dictionary.status = TypeStatus.Built;
25543 |         return dictionary.finishProcess(pid);
25544 |     }
25545 |     function lock(Dictionary_1 storage dictionary) internal returns(Dictionary_1 storage) {
25546 |         uint pid = dictionary.startProcess("lock");
25547 |         Validator.MUST_Built(dictionary);
25548 |         dictionary.status = TypeStatus.Locked;
25549 |         return dictionary.finishProcessInStorage(pid);
25550 |     }
25551 | 
25552 |     /**==========================
25553 |         🏛 Standard Registry
25554 |     ============================*/
25555 |     function startBuilding(StdRegistry storage registry) internal returns(StdRegistry storage) {
25556 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("startBuilding");
25557 |         Validator.MUST_NotLocked(registry);
25558 |         registry.status = TypeStatus.Building;
25559 |         return registry.finishProcess(pid);
25560 |     }
25561 |     function finishBuilding(StdRegistry storage registry) internal returns(StdRegistry storage) {
25562 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("finishBuilding");
25563 |         Validator.MUST_Building(registry);
25564 |         if (Validator.ValidateBuilder(registry)) registry.status = TypeStatus.Built;
25565 |         return registry.finishProcess(pid);
25566 |     }
25567 |     function lock(StdRegistry storage registry) internal returns(StdRegistry storage) {
25568 |         uint pid = registry.startProcess("lock");
25569 |         Validator.MUST_Built(registry);
25570 |         registry.status = TypeStatus.Locked;
25571 |         return registry.finishProcess(pid);
25572 |     }
25573 | 
25574 |     /**==========================
25575 |         🏰 Standard Functions
25576 |     ============================*/
25577 |     function startBuilding(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
25578 |         uint pid = std.startProcess("startBuilding");
25579 |         Validator.MUST_NotLocked(std);
25580 |         std.status = TypeStatus.Building;
25581 |         return std.finishProcess(pid);
25582 |     }
25583 |     function finishBuilding(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
25584 |         uint pid = std.startProcess("finishBuilding");
25585 |         Validator.MUST_Building(std);
25586 |         if (Validator.ValidateBuilder(std)) std.status = TypeStatus.Built;
25587 |         return std.finishProcess(pid);
25588 |     }
25589 |     function lock(StdFunctions storage std) internal returns(StdFunctions storage) {
25590 |         uint pid = std.startProcess("lock");
25591 |         Validator.MUST_Built(std);
25592 |         std.status = TypeStatus.Locked;
25593 |         return std.finishProcess(pid);
25594 |     }
25595 | 
25596 | }
25597 | 
25598 | // src/devkit/utils/ForgeHelper.sol
25599 | 
25600 | // Forge-std
25601 | 
25602 | // MC Devkit
25603 | 
25604 | // Constants
25605 | /// @dev address(uint160(uint256(keccak256("hevm cheat code"))));
25606 | Vm constant vm = Vm(0x7109709ECfa91a80626fF3989D68f67F5b1DD12D);
25607 | 
25608 | function loadAddressFrom(string memory envKey) view returns(address) {
25609 |     return ForgeHelper.loadAddressFromEnv(envKey);
25610 | }
25611 | 
25612 | /**************************************
25613 |     🛠 Helper Methods for Forge Std
25614 | **************************************/
25615 | library ForgeHelper {
25616 |     using stdToml for string;
25617 |     using Parser for string;
25618 | 
25619 |     /**-------------------
25620 |         🔧 Env File
25621 |     ---------------------*/
25622 |     function loadPrivateKey(string memory envKey) internal view returns(uint256) {
25623 |         return uint256(vm.envBytes32(envKey));
25624 |     }
25625 | 
25626 |     function loadAddressFromEnv(string memory envKey) internal view returns(address) {
25627 |         return vm.envOr(envKey, address(0));
25628 |     }
25629 | 
25630 |     /**------------------
25631 |         📍 Address
25632 |     --------------------*/
25633 |     function getAddress(address target, bytes32 slot) internal view returns(address) {
25634 |         return address(uint160(uint256(vm.load(target, slot))));
25635 |     }
25636 | 
25637 |     function getDictionaryAddress(address proxy) internal view returns(address) {
25638 |         return getAddress(proxy, ProxyUtils.DICTIONARY_SLOT);
25639 |     }
25640 | 
25641 |     function injectCode(address target, bytes memory runtimeBytecode) internal {
25642 |         vm.etch(target, runtimeBytecode);
25643 |     }
25644 | 
25645 |     function injectAddressToStorage(address target, bytes32 slot, address addr) internal {
25646 |         vm.store(target, slot, bytes32(uint256(uint160(addr))));
25647 |     }
25648 | 
25649 |     function injectDictionary(address proxy, address dictionary) internal {
25650 |         injectAddressToStorage(proxy, ProxyUtils.DICTIONARY_SLOT, dictionary);
25651 |     }
25652 | 
25653 |     function assumeAddressIsNotReserved(address addr) internal pure {
25654 |         vm.assume(
25655 |             addr != address(1) &&
25656 |             addr != address(2) &&
25657 |             addr != address(3) &&
25658 |             addr != address(4) &&
25659 |             addr != address(5) &&
25660 |             addr != address(6) &&
25661 |             addr != address(7) &&
25662 |             addr != address(8) &&
25663 |             addr != address(9) &&
25664 |             addr != 0x4e59b44847b379578588920cA78FbF26c0B4956C &&
25665 |             addr != 0x7109709ECfa91a80626fF3989D68f67F5b1DD12D &&
25666 |             addr != 0x000000000000000000636F6e736F6c652e6c6f67
25667 |         );
25668 |     }
25669 | 
25670 |     /**----------------
25671 |         📓 Context
25672 |     ------------------*/
25673 |     function msgSender() internal returns(address) {
25674 |         (VmSafe.CallerMode callerMode_, address msgSender_,) = vm.readCallers();
25675 |         if (callerMode_ == VmSafe.CallerMode.None) return address(this);
25676 |         return msgSender_;
25677 |     }
25678 | 
25679 |     /**---------------
25680 |         🏷️ Label
25681 |     -----------------*/
25682 |     function assignLabel(address addr, string memory name) internal returns(address) {
25683 |         vm.label(addr, name);
25684 |         return addr;
25685 |     }
25686 | 
25687 |     function getLabel(address addr) internal view returns(string memory) {
25688 |         return vm.getLabel(addr);
25689 |     }
25690 | 
25691 |     /**--------------
25692 |         📂 TOML
25693 |     ----------------*/
25694 |     function readBoolOr(string memory toml, string memory key, bool or) internal view returns(bool) {
25695 |         return vm.keyExistsToml(toml, key) ? toml.readBool(key) : or ;
25696 |     }
25697 |     function readStringOr(string memory toml, string memory key, string memory or) internal view returns(string memory) {
25698 |         return vm.keyExistsToml(toml, key) ? toml.readString(key) : or ;
25699 |     }
25700 |     function readUintOr(string memory toml, string memory key, uint or) internal view returns(uint) {
25701 |         return vm.keyExistsToml(toml, key) ? toml.readUint(key) : or ;
25702 |     }
25703 |     function readLogLevelOr(string memory toml, string memory key, Logger.Level or) internal view returns(Logger.Level) {
25704 |         return vm.keyExistsToml(toml, key) ? toml.readString(key).toLogLevel() : or ;
25705 |     }
25706 | 
25707 |     /**------------------
25708 |         📡 Broadcast
25709 |     --------------------*/
25710 |     function pauseBroadcast() internal returns(bool isBroadcasting, address) {
25711 |         (,address currentSender,) = vm.readCallers();
25712 |         isBroadcasting = vm.isContext(VmSafe.ForgeContext.ScriptBroadcast);
25713 |         if (isBroadcasting) vm.stopBroadcast();
25714 |         return (isBroadcasting, currentSender);
25715 |     }
25716 |     function resumeBroadcast(bool isBroadcasting, address currentSender) internal {
25717 |         if (isBroadcasting) vm.startBroadcast(currentSender);
25718 |     }
25719 | 
25720 | }

25739 | /************************************
25740 |  *  🚀 Deployment
25741 |  *      🌞 Deploy Meta Contract
25742 |  *          - Deploy
25743 |  *          - DeployImmutable
25744 |  *          - DeployRestrictedUpgradeable
25745 |  *          - DeployContractUpgradeable
25746 |  *      🏠 Deploy Proxy

25750 | *************************************/
25751 | library MCDeployLib {
25752 | 
25753 |     /**-----------------------------
25754 |         🌞 Deploy Meta Contract
25755 |     -------------------------------*/
25756 |     function deploy(MCDevKit storage mc, Bundle storage bundle, address owner, bytes memory initData) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
25757 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deploy", param_19(bundle, owner, initData));
25758 |         Dictionary_1 storage dictionary = mc.deployDictionary(bundle, owner);
25759 |         mc.deployProxy(dictionary, initData);
25760 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
25761 |     }
25762 |     // With Default Value
25763 |     function deploy(MCDevKit storage mc) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
25764 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deploy");
25765 |         mc.deploy(mc.bundle.findCurrent(), ForgeHelper.msgSender(), "");
25766 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
25767 |     }
25768 |     function deploy(MCDevKit storage mc, Bundle storage bundle) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
25769 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deploy", param_25(bundle));
25770 |         mc.deploy(bundle, ForgeHelper.msgSender(), "");
25771 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
25772 |     }
25773 |     function deploy(MCDevKit storage mc, Bundle storage bundle, address owner) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
25774 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deploy", param_7(bundle, owner));
25775 |         mc.deploy(bundle, owner, "");
25776 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
25777 |     }
25778 |     function deploy(MCDevKit storage mc, Bundle storage bundle, bytes memory initData) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
25779 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deploy", param_26(bundle, initData));
25780 |         mc.deploy(bundle, ForgeHelper.msgSender(), initData);
25781 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
25782 |     }
25783 |     function deploy(MCDevKit storage mc, address owner) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
25784 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deploy", param_0(owner));
25785 |         mc.deploy(mc.bundle.findCurrent(), owner, "");
25786 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
25787 |     }
25788 |     function deploy(MCDevKit storage mc, address owner, bytes memory initData) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
25789 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deploy", param_1(owner, initData));
25790 |         mc.deploy(mc.bundle.findCurrent(), owner, initData);
25791 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
25792 |     }
25793 |     function deploy(MCDevKit storage mc, bytes memory initData) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
25794 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deploy", param_4(initData));
25795 |         mc.deploy(mc.bundle.findCurrent(), ForgeHelper.msgSender(), initData);
25796 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
25797 |     }

25799 |     /**---------------------
25800 |         🏠 Deploy Proxy
25801 |     -----------------------*/
25802 |     function deployProxy(MCDevKit storage mc, Dictionary_1 storage dictionary, bytes memory initData) internal returns(Proxy_2 memory proxy) {
25803 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deployProxy", param_2(dictionary, initData));
25804 |         Validator.MUST_Completed(dictionary);
25805 |         /// @dev Accepts any initData as input
25806 |         Proxy_2 memory _proxy = ProxyLib.deploy(dictionary, initData);
25807 |         proxy = mc.proxy.register(dictionary.name, _proxy);
25808 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
25809 |     }
25810 |     // With Default Value

25812 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deployProxy");
25813 |         proxy = mc.deployProxy(mc.dictionary.findCurrent(), "");
25814 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
25815 |     }

25818 |         proxy = mc.deployProxy(dictionary, "");
25819 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
25820 |     }

25824 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
25825 |     }
25826 | 
25827 |     /**-------------------------
25828 |         📚 Deploy Dictionary
25829 |     ---------------------------*/
25830 |     function deployDictionary(MCDevKit storage mc, Bundle storage bundle, address owner) internal returns(Dictionary_1 storage dictionary) {
25831 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deployDictionary", param_7(bundle, owner));
25832 |         Validator.MUST_Completed(bundle);
25833 |         Validator.SHOULD_OwnerIsNotZeroAddress(owner);
25834 |         Dictionary_1 memory _dictionary = DictionaryLib
25835 |                                             .deploy(owner)
25836 |                                             .assignName(bundle.name)
25837 |                                             .set(bundle)
25838 |                                             .upgradeFacade(bundle.facade); // TODO gen and set facade
25839 |         dictionary = mc.dictionary.register(_dictionary);
25840 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
25841 |     }
25842 |     // With Default Value
25843 |     function deployDictionary(MCDevKit storage mc) internal returns(Dictionary_1 storage dictionary) {
25844 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deployDictionary");
25845 |         dictionary = mc.deployDictionary(mc.bundle.findCurrent(), ForgeHelper.msgSender());
25846 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
25847 |     }
25848 |     function deployDictionary(MCDevKit storage mc, Bundle storage bundle) internal returns(Dictionary_1 storage dictionary) {
25849 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("deployDictionary", param_25(bundle));
25850 |         dictionary = mc.deployDictionary(bundle, ForgeHelper.msgSender());
25851 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
25852 |     }

25855 |         dictionary = mc.deployDictionary(mc.bundle.findCurrent(), owner);
25856 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
25857 |     }

25864 |         Dictionary_1 memory _duplicatedDictionary = DictionaryLib.duplicate(dictionary, owner);
25865 |         duplicatedDictionary = mc.dictionary.register(_duplicatedDictionary);
25866 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
25867 |     }

26048 | // src/devkit/utils/global/MCInitLib.sol
26049 | 
26050 | // Validation
26051 | 
26052 | // Utils
26053 | 
26054 | // Core
26055 | 
26056 |     using NameGenerator for mapping(string => Bundle);
26057 | 
26058 | /**************************************
26059 |  *  🎁 MC Initial Configuration
26060 |  *      🌱 Init Bundle
26061 |  *      🔗 Use Function
26062 |  *      🪟 Use Facade
26063 |  *      🏰 Setup Standard Functions
26064 | ***************************************/
26065 | library MCInitLib {
26066 | 
26067 |     /**--------------------
26068 |         🌱 Init Bundle
26069 |     ----------------------*/
26070 |     function init(MCDevKit storage mc, string memory name) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
26071 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("init", param_27(name));
26072 |         mc.bundle.init(name);
26073 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
26074 |     }
26075 |     function init(MCDevKit storage mc) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
26076 |         return init(mc, mc.bundle.genUniqueName());
26077 |     }
26078 | 
26079 |     /**---------------------
26080 |         🔗 Use Function
26081 |     -----------------------*/
26082 |     function use(MCDevKit storage mc, string memory name, bytes4 selector, address implementation) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
26083 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("use", param_20(name, selector, implementation));
26084 |         // Register new function
26085 |         Validator.MUST_NotEmptyName(name);
26086 |         Validator.SHOULD_NotEmptySelector(selector);
26087 |         Validator.MUST_AddressIsContract(implementation);
26088 |         mc.functions.register(name, selector, implementation);
26089 |         // Push to current bundle
26090 |         mc.bundle.ensureInit();
26091 |         mc.bundle.findCurrent().pushFunction(mc.functions.find(name));
26092 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
26093 |     }
26094 |     function use(MCDevKit storage mc, bytes4 selector, address implementation) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
26095 |         return use(mc, ForgeHelper.getLabel(implementation), selector, implementation);
26096 |     }
26097 |     function use(MCDevKit storage mc, Function storage func) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
26098 |         return use(mc, func.name, func.selector, func.implementation);
26099 |     }
26100 |     function use(MCDevKit storage mc, string memory functionName) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
26101 |         return use(mc, mc.functions.find(functionName));
26102 |     }
26103 | 
26104 |     /**------------------
26105 |         🪟 Use Facade
26106 |     --------------------*/
26107 |     /// @notice Assign facade address to current bundle
26108 |     function useFacade(MCDevKit storage mc, address facade) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
26109 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("useFacade", param_0(facade));
26110 |         mc.bundle.ensureInit();
26111 |         mc.bundle.findCurrent().assignFacade(facade);
26112 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
26113 |     }
26114 | 
26115 |     /**--------------------------------
26116 |         🏰 Setup Standard Functions
26117 |     ----------------------------------*/
26118 |     function setupStdFunctions(MCDevKit storage mc) internal returns(MCDevKit storage) {
26119 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("setupStdFunctions");
26120 |         mc.std.complete();
26121 |         return mc.finishProcess(pid);
26122 |     }
26123 | 
26124 | }

26139 | /*************************************

26142 |  *      🏠 Mocking Proxy
26143 |  *      📚 Mocking Dictionary
26144 | **************************************/
26145 | library MCMockLib {
26146 | 
26147 |     /**-----------------------------
26148 |         🌞 Mocking Meta Contract
26149 |     -------------------------------*/
26150 | 
26151 |     /**---------------------
26152 |         🏠 Mocking Proxy
26153 |     -----------------------*/
26154 |     function createMockProxy(MCDevKit storage mc, Bundle storage bundle, bytes memory initData) internal returns(Proxy_2 storage mockProxy) {
26155 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("createMockProxy", param_26(bundle, initData));
26156 |         Validator.MUST_Completed(bundle);
26157 |         Proxy_2 memory _mockProxy = ProxyLib.createSimpleMock(bundle.functions);
26158 |         mockProxy = mc.proxy.register(mc.proxy.genUniqueMockName(bundle.name), _mockProxy);
26159 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
26160 |     }
26161 |     function createMockProxy(MCDevKit storage mc, Bundle storage bundle) internal returns(Proxy_2 storage mockProxy) {
26162 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("createMockProxy", param_25(bundle));
26163 |         mockProxy = mc.createMockProxy(bundle, "");
26164 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
26165 |     }
26166 |     function createMockProxy(MCDevKit storage mc, bytes memory initData) internal returns(Proxy_2 storage mockProxy) {
26167 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("createMockProxy", param_4(initData));
26168 |         mockProxy = mc.createMockProxy(mc.bundle.findCurrent(), initData);
26169 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
26170 |     }
26171 |     function createMockProxy(MCDevKit storage mc) internal returns(Proxy_2 storage mockProxy) {
26172 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("createMockProxy");
26173 |         mockProxy = mc.createMockProxy(mc.bundle.findCurrent(), "");
26174 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
26175 |     }
26176 | 
26177 |     /**-------------------------
26178 |         📚 Mocking Dictionary
26179 |     ---------------------------*/
26180 |     function createMockDictionary(MCDevKit storage mc, Bundle storage bundle, address owner) internal returns(Dictionary_1 storage mockDictionary) {
26181 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("createMockDictionary", param_7(bundle, owner));
26182 |         Validator.MUST_Completed(bundle);
26183 |         Validator.SHOULD_OwnerIsNotZeroAddress(owner);
26184 |         Dictionary_1 memory _mockDictionary = DictionaryLib
26185 |                                                 .createMock(bundle, owner)
26186 |                                                 .assignName(mc.dictionary.genUniqueMockName(bundle.name));
26187 |         mockDictionary = mc.dictionary.register(_mockDictionary);
26188 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
26189 |     }
26190 |     // With Default Value
26191 |     function createMockDictionary(MCDevKit storage mc) internal returns(Dictionary_1 storage mockDictionary) {
26192 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("createMockDictionary");
26193 |         mockDictionary = mc.createMockDictionary(mc.bundle.findCurrent(), ForgeHelper.msgSender());
26194 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
26195 |     }
26196 |     function createMockDictionary(MCDevKit storage mc, Bundle storage bundle) internal returns(Dictionary_1 storage mockDictionary) {
26197 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("createMockDictionary", param_25(bundle));
26198 |         mockDictionary = mc.createMockDictionary(bundle, ForgeHelper.msgSender());
26199 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
26200 |     }
26201 |     function createMockDictionary(MCDevKit storage mc, address owner) internal returns(Dictionary_1 storage mockDictionary) {
26202 |         uint pid = mc.startProcess("createMockDictionary", param_0(owner));
26203 |         mockDictionary = mc.createMockDictionary(mc.bundle.findCurrent(), owner);
26204 |         mc.finishProcess(pid);
26205 |     }
26206 | 
26207 | }
26208 | 
26209 | // src/devkit/utils/mapping/NameGenerator.sol
26210 | 
26211 | // Core Types
26212 | 
26213 | // Utils
26214 | 
26215 |     using Formatter for string;
26216 | 
26217 | /**=======================
26218 |     🏷️ Name Generator
26219 | =========================*/
26220 | library NameGenerator {
26221 |     string constant MOCK = "Mock";
26222 | 
26223 |     /**------------------------
26224 |         🗂️ Bundle Mapping
26225 |     --------------------------*/
26226 |     function genUniqueName(mapping(string => Bundle) storage bundle, string memory baseName) internal view returns(string memory name) {
26227 |         for (uint i = 1; i <= System.Config().SYSTEM.SCAN_RANGE; ++i) {
26228 |             name = baseName.toSequential(i);
26229 |             if (bundle[name].isUninitialized()) return name; // TODO
26230 |         }
26231 |         Validator.MUST_FoundInRange();
26232 |     }
26233 |     function genUniqueName(mapping(string => Bundle) storage bundle) internal view returns(string memory name) {
26234 |         return genUniqueName(bundle, System.Config().DEFAULT_NAME.BUNDLE);
26235 |     }
26236 | 
26237 |     /**-------------------------
26238 |         🧩 Function Mapping
26239 |     ---------------------------*/
26240 |     function genUniqueName(mapping(string => Function) storage func, string memory baseName) internal view returns(string memory name) {
26241 |         for (uint i = 1; i <= System.Config().SYSTEM.SCAN_RANGE; ++i) {
26242 |             name = baseName.toSequential(i);
26243 |             if (func[name].isUninitialized()) return name;
26244 |         }
26245 |         Validator.MUST_FoundInRange();
26246 |     }
26247 |     function genUniqueName(mapping(string => Function) storage func) internal view returns(string memory name) {
26248 |         return genUniqueName(func, System.Config().DEFAULT_NAME.FUNCTION);
26249 |     }
26250 | 
26251 |     /**---------------------------
26252 |         📚 Dictionary Mapping
26253 |     -----------------------------*/
26254 |     function genUniqueName(mapping(string => Dictionary_1) storage dictionary, string memory baseName) internal view returns(string memory name) {
26255 |         for (uint i = 1; i <= System.Config().SYSTEM.SCAN_RANGE; ++i) {
26256 |             name = baseName.toSequential(i);
26257 |             if (dictionary[name].isUninitialized()) return name;
26258 |         }
26259 |         Validator.MUST_FoundInRange();
26260 |     }
26261 |     /*----- Dictionary -----*/
26262 |     function genUniqueName(mapping(string => Dictionary_1) storage dictionary) internal view returns(string memory name) {
26263 |         return genUniqueName(dictionary, System.Config().DEFAULT_NAME.DICTIONARY);
26264 |     }
26265 |     /*----- Duplicated Dictionary -----*/
26266 |     function genUniqueDuplicatedName(mapping(string => Dictionary_1) storage dictionary) internal view returns(string memory name) {
26267 |         return genUniqueName(dictionary, System.Config().DEFAULT_NAME.DICTIONARY_DUPLICATED);
26268 |     }
26269 |     /*----- Mock Dictionary -----*/
26270 |     function genUniqueMockName(mapping(string => Dictionary_1) storage dictionary, string memory baseName) internal view returns(string memory name) {
26271 |         return genUniqueName(dictionary, MOCK.append(baseName));
26272 |         // return genUniqueName(dictionary, System.Config().DEFAULT_NAME.DICTIONARY_MOCK);
26273 |     }
26274 | 
26275 |     /**-----------------------
26276 |         🏠 Proxy Mapping
26277 |     -------------------------*/
26278 |     /*----- Mock Proxy -----*/
26279 |     function genUniqueName(mapping(string => Proxy_2) storage proxy, string memory baseName) internal view returns(string memory name) {
26280 |         for (uint i = 1; i <= System.Config().SYSTEM.SCAN_RANGE; ++i) {
26281 |             name = baseName.toSequential(i);
26282 |             if (proxy[name].isUninitialized()) return name;
26283 |         }
26284 |         Validator.MUST_FoundInRange();
26285 |     }
26286 |     /*----- Proxy -----*/
26287 |     function genUniqueName(mapping(string => Proxy_2) storage proxy) internal view returns(string memory name) {
26288 |         return genUniqueName(proxy, System.Config().DEFAULT_NAME.PROXY);
26289 |     }
26290 |     /*----- Mock Proxy -----*/
26291 |     function genUniqueMockName(mapping(string => Proxy_2) storage proxy, string memory baseName) internal view returns(string memory name) {
26292 |         return genUniqueName(proxy, MOCK.append(baseName));
26293 |         // return genUniqueName(proxy, System.Config().DEFAULT_NAME.PROXY_MOCK);
26294 |     }
26295 | 
26296 | }
26297 | 
26298 | // src/devkit/MCBase.sol
26299 | 
26300 | // 🛠 FORGE STD
26301 | 
26302 | abstract contract MCBase is CommonBase {
26303 |     MCDevKit internal mc;
26304 |     uint256 internal deployerKey;
26305 |     address internal deployer;
26306 | 
26307 |     constructor() {
26308 |         System.Config().load();
26309 |     }
26310 | }
26311 | 
26312 | abstract contract MCScriptBase is MCBase, Script {
26313 |     modifier startBroadcastWith(string memory envKey) {
26314 |         deployerKey = mc.loadPrivateKey(envKey);
26315 |         deployer = vm.addr(deployerKey);
26316 |         vm.startBroadcast(deployerKey);
26317 |         _;
26318 |     }
26319 | }
26320 | 
26321 | abstract contract MCTestBase is MCBase, Test {
26322 |     modifier startPrankWith(string memory envKey) {
26323 |         deployer = vm.envOr(envKey, makeAddr(envKey));
26324 |         vm.startPrank(deployer);
26325 |         _;
26326 |     }
26327 | }
26328 | 
26329 | // src/devkit/MCScript.sol
26330 | 
26331 | // 💬 ABOUT
26332 | // Meta Contract's default Script based on Forge Std Script
26333 | 
26334 | // 🛠 FORGE STD INTERFACE
26335 | 
26336 | // 📦 BOILERPLATE
26337 | 
26338 | // ⭐️ MC SCRIPT
26339 | abstract contract MCScript is MCScriptBase {
26340 |     function _saveAddrToEnv(address addr, string memory envKeyBase) internal {
26341 |         if (!vm.isContext(VmSafe.ForgeContext.ScriptBroadcast)) return;
26342 | 
26343 |         uint256 _chainId;
26344 |         assembly {
26345 |             _chainId := chainid()
26346 |         }
26347 |         string memory _chainIdString = vm.toString(_chainId);
26348 | 
26349 |         vm.writeLine(
26350 |             string.concat(vm.projectRoot(), "/.env"),
26351 |             string.concat(
26352 |                 envKeyBase,
26353 |                 _chainIdString,
26354 |                 "=",
26355 |                 vm.toString(address(addr))
26356 |             )
26357 |         );
26358 |     }
26359 | }
26360 | 
26361 | // src/devkit/MCTest.sol
26362 | 
26363 | // 💬 ABOUT
26364 | // Meta Contract's default Test based on Forge Std Test
26365 | 
26366 | // 📦 BOILERPLATE
26367 | 
26368 | // 🌟 MC State Fuzzing Test
26369 | abstract contract MCTest is MCTestBase, Proxy_0 {
26370 |     struct Function {
26371 |         bytes4 selector;
26372 |         address implementation;
26373 |     }
26374 | 
26375 |     mapping(bytes4 selector => address) implementations;
26376 |     address target = address(this);
26377 |     Function[] internal functions;
26378 |     address dictionary;
26379 |     address receiver = address(new Receive());
26380 | 
26381 |     function _use(bytes4 selector_, address impl_) internal {
26382 |         functions.push(Function(selector_, impl_));
26383 |         implementations[selector_] = impl_;
26384 |     }
26385 | 
26386 |     function _setDictionary(address dictionary_) internal {
26387 |         dictionary = dictionary_;
26388 |         vm.store(address(this), ProxyUtils.DICTIONARY_SLOT, Formatter.toBytes32(dictionary_));
26389 |     }
26390 | 
26391 |     function _implementation() internal view override returns (address implementation) {
26392 |         implementation = implementations[msg.sig];
26393 |         Validator.MUST_UseFunctionContract(implementation);
26394 |         return implementation;
26395 |     }
26396 | 
26397 |     receive() external payable {
26398 |         _delegate(receiver);
26399 |     }
26400 | }
26401 | 
26402 | // src/devkit/test/dummy/Dummy.sol
26403 | 
26404 | library Dummy {
26405 |     function bundleName() internal pure returns(string memory) {
26406 |         return "DummyBundleName";
26407 |     }
26408 | 
26409 |     function functionSelector() internal pure returns(bytes4) {
26410 |         return DummyFunction.dummy.selector;
26411 |     }
26412 | 
26413 |     function functionAddress() internal returns(address) {
26414 |         return address(new DummyFunction());
26415 |     }
26416 | 
26417 |     function facadeAddress() internal returns(address) {
26418 |         return address(new DummyFacade());
26419 |     }
26420 | 
26421 |     function setBundle(MCDevKit storage mc) internal {
26422 |         mc.init("DummyBundle");
26423 |         mc.use(DummyFunction.dummy.selector, address(new DummyFunction()));
26424 |         mc.useFacade(address(new DummyFacade()));
26425 |     }
26426 | 
26427 |     function dictionary(MCDevKit storage mc) internal returns(address) {
26428 |         setBundle(mc);
26429 |         return mc.createMockDictionary().addr;
26430 |     }
26431 | 
26432 |     function dictionary(MCDevKit storage mc, MCTest.Function[] memory functions) internal returns(address) {
26433 |         mc.init("DummyBundle");
26434 |         for (uint i; i < functions.length; ++i) {
26435 |             mc.use(functions[i].selector, functions[i].implementation);
26436 |         }
26437 |         mc.useFacade(address(new DummyFacade()));
26438 |         return mc.createMockDictionary().addr;
26439 |     }
26440 | 
26441 |     function contractAddr() internal returns(address) {
26442 |         return address(new DummyContract());
26443 |     }
26444 | 
26445 | }
